The paginated response includes an array of statement information with the end-user's account id and statement details such as statement id, date, description, and status. The results also include links to GET the statement image.


#### Code Sample 
```Http
curl -X GET -G \
  --url 'https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/statements/v2/mikomo/%3AaccountId'  \
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer AccessToken' \
  -d 'startTime=2020-03-30' \
  -d 'endTime=2021-03-30' \
  -d 'offset=0' \
  -d 'limit=50'
```
#### Request Parameters
- accountId (`String`): Account Identifier
- version (`String`): Akoya major version number. Do not use minor version numbers. For instance, use v2 and not v2.2
- providerId (`String`): Id of provider
- startTime (`Date`): Start date for use in retrieval of statements (ISO 8601)
- endTime (`Date`): End date for use in retrieval of statements (ISO 8601)
- offset (`String`): The number of items to skip before the first in the response. The default is 0.
- limit (`Number`): The maximum number of items to be returned in the response. The default is 50.
- x-akoya-interaction-type (`Interaction Type`): Optional but recommended header to include with each data request. 
Allowed values are `user` or `batch`. 
`user` indicates a request is prompted by an end-user action.
`batch` indicates the request is part of a batch process.
#### Response Type
- Paginated Array
#### Response Properties
- response (`Paginated Array`): OK


### get-statements
Retrieve a specific account statement file. Use [HTTP Accept request-header](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html) to specify desired content types. 

For the initial launch, only PDF statements are supported. PDFs are returned in the response.

### cURL request

We recommend using the auto-generated cURL request with the {idToken}, accountId, providerId, statementId, and version with an added cURL parameter to return the output to a file. For example:

```curl
curl --request GET --url https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/statements/v2/mikomo/513815781465/P9CvLPKDaFRMbNDkhu1 --header "accept: application/pdf" --header "authorization: Bearer {idtoken}" --output example.pdf
```


#### Code Sample 
```Http
curl -X GET \
  --url 'https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/statements/v2/mikomo/%3AaccountId/statementId'  \
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer AccessToken'
```
#### Request Parameters
- accountId (`String`): Account Identifier
- version (`String`): Akoya major version number. Do not use minor version numbers. For instance, use v2 and not v2.2
- providerId (`String`): Id of provider
- statementId (`String`): Statement Identifier
- x-akoya-interaction-type (`Interaction Type`): Optional but recommended header to include with each data request. 
Allowed values are `user` or `batch`. 
`user` indicates a request is prompted by an end-user action.
`batch` indicates the request is part of a batch process.
#### Response Type
- Any
#### Response Properties
- response (`Any`): OK - An image of an account statement

## Tax (beta)

### taxFormsSearch
Get the full lists of tax document data and tax form images available for a specific year for the current authorized customer.


#### Code Sample 
```Http
curl -X GET -G \
  --url 'https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/tax-forms/v2/providerId6'  \
  -H 'x-akoya-interaction-id: unique-request-id-001' \
  -H 'x-akoya-interaction-type: user' \
  -H 'Accept: ["application/json"]' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer AccessToken' \
  -d 'taxYear=2024' \
  -d 'taxForms[0]=Tax1099Div' \
  -d 'taxForms[1]=Tax1099Int'
```
#### Request Parameters
- version (`Version`): Endpoint version.
- providerId (`String`): Provider to query for Tax data.
- x-akoya-interaction-id (`String`): Unique identifier to associate with this request. No specific format required.
- x-akoya-interaction-type (`Interaction Type`): Identifies whether the customer is present (USER) or it is a BATCH operation. Case-insensitive.
- Accept (`array<Accept Media Type>`): Use the [Accept HTTP request header](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Accept) to indicate one or more content types to request for the search result response. Use `application/json` to request data or `application/pdf to request images in comma-separated array format.         Use in combination with TaxDataTypeQuery parameter to request `application/json` responses in ''JSON'' or ''BASE64_PDF'' format for tax form data'
- taxYear (`String`): Tax year in which to search for tax forms.
- taxForms (`array<Type Form Type>`): One or more tax form type enums for the specific documents being requested. Comma separated
- accountId (`String`): Unique account identifier (not the account number)
#### Response Type
- Tax Statement List
#### Response Properties
- response (`Tax Statement List`): Array of all the tax document data and tax form images available for the customer matching search criteria


### getTaxForm
Get the Tax Statement as JSON or PDF for a single tax document for the customer. Use [HTTP Accept request-header](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html) to specify desired content types. See `AcceptHeader` definition for typical values.

Not all providers support PDF payloads. See [this article](https://recipient.ddp.akoya.com/support/article/kA0Uw00000026VxKAI) in the Data Recipent Hub for a list of providers that support document PDFs.


#### Code Sample 
```Http
curl -X GET -G \
  --url 'https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/tax-forms/v2/providerId6/taxFormId2'  \
  -H 'x-akoya-interaction-id: unique-request-id-001' \
  -H 'x-akoya-interaction-type: user' \
  -H 'Accept: ["application/json"]' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer AccessToken' \
  -d 'taxDataType=JSON'
```
#### Request Parameters
- version (`Version`): Endpoint version.
- providerId (`String`): Provider to query for Tax data.
- taxFormId (`String`): Unique identifier of the tax form to request.
- x-akoya-interaction-id (`String`): Unique identifier to associate with this request. No specific format required.
- x-akoya-interaction-type (`Interaction Type`): Identifies whether the customer is present (USER) or it is a BATCH operation. Case-insensitive.
- taxDataType (`Type Data Type`): Use taxDataType to request `application/json` tax form data response in 'JSON' or 'BASE64_PDF' format. Omit if either format is acceptable. Used in combination with AcceptHeader requesting `application/json` response
- Accept (`array<Accept Media Type>`): Use the [Accept HTTP request header](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Accept) to indicate one or more content types to request for the search result response. Use `application/json` to request data or `application/pdf`to request images. In comma-separated array format.         Use in combination with TaxDataTypeQuery parameter to request `application/json` responses in ''JSON'' or ''BASE64_PDF'' format for tax form data'
#### Response Type
- Tax Statement 1
#### Response Properties
- response (`Tax Statement 1`): The document image or TaxStatement as json for a single tax document for the customer. A single document can include multiple IRS tax forms and/or other reporting statements as delivered by providers

## Transactions

### get-transactions
The transactions API allows you to retrieve transaction history of consumer-permissioned accounts.

> üõë
> 
> The *id_token* should be used as the bearer token with this call.

For more information on how to paginate transaction results, please see: [Pagination](https://docs.akoya.com/v2/docs/pagination)

Use the `mode` query param to receive FDX-aligned, standardized data values (Beta). For example:

`https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/transactions/v2/mikomo?mode=standard`

`mode` is available in both sandbox and production.

`mode` is supported by a subset of providers. Log into the [Data Recipient Hub](https://recipient.ddp.akoya.com/login) and click [here](https://recipient.ddp.akoya.com/support/article/kA0Uw00000015GzKAI) to view a list of all providers supporting the `mode` parameter.


#### Code Sample 
```Http
curl -X GET -G \
  --url 'https://sandbox-products.ddp.akoya.com/transactions/v2/mikomo/%3AaccountId'  \
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer AccessToken' \
  -d 'startTime=2020-03-30T04%3A00%3A00Z' \
  -d 'endTime=2021-03-30T04%3A00%3A00Z' \
  -d 'offset=0' \
  -d 'limit=50' \
  -d 'mode=raw'
```
#### Request Parameters
- version (`String`): Akoya major version number. Do not use minor version numbers. For instance, use v2 and not v2.2
- providerId (`String`): Id of provider
- accountId (`String`): Account Identifier
- startTime (`DateTime`): ISO 8601 date format in UTC time zone. If blank, the default value (current date - 15 calendar days) is used. If a value is specified, endTime is required.
- endTime (`DateTime`): ISO 8601 date format in UTC time zone. If blank, the default value (current date) is used. If a value is specified, startTime is required.
- offset (`String`): The number of items to skip before the first in the response. The default is 0.
- limit (`Number`): The maximum number of items to be returned in the response. The default is 50.
- x-akoya-interaction-type (`Interaction Type`): Optional but recommended header to include with each data request. 
Allowed values are `user` or `batch`. 
`user` indicates a request is prompted by an end-user action.
`batch` indicates the request is part of a batch process.
- mode (`Mode`): BETA. Default is raw. Use standard for FDX-aligned, standardized data values.
#### Response Type
- Transactions Entity
#### Response Properties
- response (`Transactions Entity`): OK



# Models

## Account information


### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers


## Payment Network Supported by Account
This provides details required to execute a transaction against the account within the payment network

### Properties
- bankId (`String`): Bank identifier used by the payment network ie. Routing Number
- identifier (`String`): The number used to identify the account within the payment network. If identifierType is ACCOUNT_NUMBER, this is the account number.
- identifierType (`String`): Type of identifier
- type (`String`): Type of payment network
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Can transfer funds to the account using this information
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Can transfer funds from the account using this information


## Address
U.S. domestic address or a foreign address with country other than 'US'

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code


## Investment Balance List


### Properties
- balanceName (`String`): Name of the balance.
- balanceDescription (`String`): Description of balance.
- balanceType (`Balance Type 1`): The type of an investment balance. AMOUNT or PERCENTAGE.
- balanceValue (`Decimal`): Value of balance name.
- balanceDate (`DateTime`): Date as of this balance.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.


## Business name
Name 1, Name 2

### Properties
- name1 (`String`): Name line 1
- name2 (`String`): Name line 2


## Business Income Statement
Business Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule C

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- businessName (`String`): Box C, Business name
- sales (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross receipts or sales
- returns (`Decimal`): Box 2, Returns and allowances
- otherIncome (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 6, Other income, including federal and state gasoline or fuel tax credit or refund
- advertising (`Decimal`): Box 8, Advertising
- carAndTruck (`Decimal`): Box 9, Car and truck expenses
- commissions (`Decimal`): Box 10, Commissions and fees
- contractLabor (`Decimal`): Box 11, Contract labor
- depletion (`Decimal`): Box 12, Depletion
- depreciation (`Decimal`): Box 13, Depreciation
- employeeBenefits (`Decimal`): Box 14, Employee benefit programs
- insurance (`Decimal`): Box 15, Insurance
- mortgageInterest (`Decimal`): Box 16a, Mortgage interest
- otherInterest (`Decimal`): Box 16b, Other interest
- legal (`Decimal`): Box 17, Legal and professional services
- office (`Decimal`): Box 18, Office expense
- pension (`Decimal`): Box 19, Pension and profit-sharing plans
- equipmentRent (`Decimal`): Box 20a, Equipment rent
- otherRent (`Decimal`): Box 20b, Other rent
- repairs (`Decimal`): Box 21, Repairs and maintenance
- supplies (`Decimal`): Box 22, Supplies
- taxes (`Decimal`): Box 23, Taxes and licenses
- travel (`Decimal`): Box 24a, Travel
- meals (`Decimal`): Box 24b, Deductible meals
- utilities (`Decimal`): Box 25, Utilities
- wages (`Decimal`): Box 26, Wages
- otherExpenses (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 27, Other expenses
- beginningInventory (`Decimal`): Box 35, Inventory at beginning of year
- purchases (`Decimal`): Box 36, Purchases
- costOfLabor (`Decimal`): Box 37, Cost of labor
- materials (`Decimal`): Box 38, Materials and supplies
- otherCosts (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 39, Other costs
- endingInventory (`Decimal`): Box 41, Inventory at end of year
- capitalExpenditures (`array<Date and Amount>`): Capital expenditures, for use in calculating Depreciation


## AnnuityAccount
Annuity Account

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- annuityProductType (`Annunity Product Type`)
- annuityValueBasis (`Annunity Value Basis`)
- paymentFrequency (`Payment Frequency 1`)


## Annuity balances
Data elements included with balances specific to annuity accounts

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- annuityProductType (`Annunity Product Type`)
- annuityValueBasis (`Annunity Value Basis`)
- paymentFrequency (`Payment Frequency 1`)
- annualIncrease (`Decimal`): Percent or dollar amount of annual payment increase
- annualIncreaseType (`Annual Increase Type`)
- netPresentValue (`Decimal`): Surrender or cash balance value
- paymentAmount (`Decimal`): Amount of the recurring payment
- paymentEndDate (`DateTime`): Date last payment will be made
- paymentStartDate (`DateTime`): Date of first payment; could be a future date
- periodCertainGuarantee (`Period Certain Guarantee`)
- totalPaymentCount (`Decimal`): Total number of payments that will be produced by the annuity


## Code and Amount
Code and amount pair used on IRS W-2, K-1, etc.

### Properties
- code (`String`): Code
- amount (`Decimal`): Amount


## Contribution Entity
Describes how new contributions are distributed among the available securities.

### Properties
- securityId (`String`): Unique identifier of security
- securityIdType (`Security Id Type`): Security identifier type
- employerMatchPercentage (`Decimal`): Employer contribution match percentage
- employerMatchAmount (`Decimal`): Employer contribution match amount
- employeePreTaxAmount (`Decimal`): Employee pre‚Äêtax contribution amount
- employeePreTaxPercentage (`Decimal`): Employee pre‚Äêtax contribution percentage
- employeeAfterTaxAmount (`Decimal`): Employee after tax contribution amount
- employeeAfterTaxPercentage (`Decimal`): Employee after tax contribution percentage
- employeeDeferPreTaxAmount (`Decimal`): Employee defer pre‚Äêtax contribution match amount
- employeeDeferPreTaxPercentage (`Decimal`): Employee defer pre‚Äêtax contribution match percentage
- employeeYearToDate (`Decimal`): Employee total year to date contribution
- employerYearToDate (`Decimal`): Employer total year to date contribution
- rolloverContributionPercentage (`Decimal`): Rollover contribution percentage
- rolloverContributionAmount (`Decimal`): Rollover contribution Amount


## Coverage Month
Month enumeration used on forms 1095-A and 1095-C

### Properties
- ANNUAL
- JANUARY
- FEBRUARY
- MARCH
- APRIL
- MAY
- JUNE
- JULY
- AUGUST
- SEPTEMBER
- OCTOBER
- NOVEMBER
- DECEMBER


## Gain or loss from cryptocurrency transaction
Tax information for a single cryptocurrency transaction. If reported on Form 1099-B, use Tax1099B and SecurityDetail instead of this entity.

### Properties
- cryptocurrencyName (`String`): Cryptocurrency name (e.g. Bitcoin)
- symbol (`String`): Cryptocurrency abbreviation or symbol (e.g. BTC)
- quantity (`Decimal`): Quantity (e.g. 0.0125662)
- saleDescription (`String`): Description of property (1099-B box 1a)
- dateAcquired (`Date`): Date acquired (1099-B box 1b)
- variousDatesAcquired (`Boolean`): Acquired on various dates (1099-B box 1b)
- dateOfSale (`Date`): Date sold or disposed (1099-B box 1c)
- salesPrice (`Decimal`): Proceeds (not price per share, 1099-B box 1d)
- costBasis (`Decimal`): Cost or other basis (1099-B box 1e)
- longOrShort (`Sale Term Type 3`): LONG or SHORT (1099-B box 2)


## Cryptocurrency Tax Statement list
Array of cryptocurrency gains and losses

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- gainsAndLosses (`array<Gain or Loss From Cryptocurrency Transaction>`): The list of cryptocurrency gains and losses


## Currency Entity
Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.

### Properties
- currencyCode (`String`): Iso 4217 currency code.
- currencyRate (`Decimal`): Currency rate between original and converted currency.
- originalCurrencyCode (`String`): Iso 4217 currency code.


## customer
Represents a customer (end-user)

### Properties
- customerId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the end-user. This identity must be unique to the owning institution
- name (`Name`): The end-user's name


## DebtSecurity Entity
Information about the debt security specific to the type of security

### Properties
- parValue (`Decimal`): Par value amount
- debtType (`Debt Type`): Debt type
- debtClass (`Debt Class`): Classification of debt
- couponRate (`Decimal`): Bond coupon rate for next closest call date
- couponDate (`DateTime`): Maturity date for next coupon
- couponMatureFrequency (`Coupon Mature Frequency`): When coupons mature
- callPrice (`Decimal`): Bond call price
- yieldToCall (`Decimal`): Yield to next call
- callDate (`DateTime`): Next call date
- callType (`Call Type`): Type of next call
- yieldToMaturity (`Decimal`): Yield to maturity
- bondMaturityDate (`DateTime`): Bond Maturity date


## DepositAccount
Deposit Account

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- annualPercentageYield (`Decimal`): Annual Percentage Yield.
- term (`Number`): Term of CD in months
- maturityDate (`DateTime`): Maturity date for CDs.


## Deposit balances
Data elements included with balances specific to deposit accounts

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- annualPercentageYield (`Decimal`): Annual Percentage Yield.
- term (`Number`): Term of CD in months
- maturityDate (`DateTime`): Maturity date for CDs.
- balanceAsOf (`DateTime`): As-of date of balances
- openingDayBalance (`Decimal`): Day's opening fund balance
- availableBalance (`Decimal`): Balance of funds available for use
- interestYtd (`Decimal`): YTD Interest
- currentBalance (`Decimal`): Balance of funds in account


## depositTransaction
Deposit transaction

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the account currency.

If balanceType is `ASSET`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "+" or not present
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "-"

If balanceType is `LIABILITY`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "-"
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "+" or not present
- category (`String`): Transaction category, preferably MCC or SIC.
- debitCreditMemo (`Debit Credit Memo`): Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.
- description (`String`): The description of the transaction
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt.
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Array of FI-specific attributes
- foreignAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the foreign currency
- foreignCurrency (`String`): The ISO 4217 code of the foreign currency
- lineItem (`array<Line Item>`): Breakdown of the transaction details
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary transaction description
- postedTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was posted to the account. If not provided then TransactionTimestamp can be used as PostedTimeStamp.
- reference (`String`): A tracking reference identifier
- referenceTransactionId (`String`): Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions which are reversals, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.

For reverse postings, the identity of the transaction being reversed. For the correction transaction, the identity of the reversing post. For credit card posting transactions, the identity of the authorization transaction.
- status (`Status 1`): AUTHORIZATION, MEMO, PENDING, or POSTED
- subCategory (`String`): Transaction category detail
- transactionId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the transaction (unique to account). 
Transaction IDs should: 

  1. be the same for pending and posted 
  2. be different for reversed transactions 
  3. `referenceTransactionId` should be present for reversed transactions'
- transactionTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was added to the server backend systems.

Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions to which it applies, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.
- payee (`String`): Payee name
- checkNumber (`Number`): Check Number
- transactionType (`Transaction Type`): DepositTransaction Type


## Date and Amount
Date, description, and amount. When used in 1098-Q, description is optional

### Properties
- date (`Date`): Date of amount. When used in 1098-Q, date of last payment in month
- description (`String`): Description of amount. When used in 1098-Q, may use MonthAbbreviation
- amount (`Decimal`): Amount of payment or receipt. When used in 1098-Q, monthly total


## Description and Amount
Description and amount pair used on IRS W-2, etc.

### Properties
- description (`String`): Description
- amount (`Decimal`): Amount


## equityGrant


### Properties
- grantId (`String`): Unique identifier of grant
- grantDate (`DateTime`): Date grant was given
- grantType (`String`): Type of grant
- seqNum (`Decimal`)
- grantPrice (`Decimal`): Grant price
- grantCurrencyCode (`String`): Indicates the currency of grant USD vs AUD vs EUR etc (for share awards, you will still get a USD)
- quantityGranted (`Decimal`): Number of options
- quantityOutstanding (`Decimal`)
- expirationDate (`DateTime`): Date grant expires
- vestings (`array<Vesting>`): An array of equityGrant vestings. Provides the past, present, and future vesting schedule and percentages.


## Error
An error entity which can be used at the API level for error responses or at the account level to indicate a problem specific to a particular account. See the error codes and descriptions defined in the latest FDX API Specification document, section 6.2 Errors

### Properties
- code (`Number`): Error code defined by FDX API Specification or Data Provider indicating the error situation which has occurred
- message (`String`): End user displayable information which might help the customer diagnose an error
- debugMessage (`String`): Message used to debug the root cause of the error. Contents should not be used in consumer's business logic. Can change at any time and should only be used for consumer to communicate with the data provider about an issue. Provider can include an error GUID in message for their use.


## Expired Option Type
Type of expired stock option. Used by IRS Form 8949

### Properties
- GRANTED
- PURCHASED


## Farm Income Statement
Farm Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule F

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- cropOrActivity (`String`): Box A, Principal crop or activity
- sales (`Decimal`): Box 1a, Sales of livestock and other resale items
- costOfItemsSold (`Decimal`): Box 1b, Cost or other basis of livestock or other items
- salesOfRaised (`Decimal`): Box 2, Sales of livestock, produce, grains, and other products you raised
- coopDistributions (`Decimal`): Box 3a, Cooperative distributions
- agProgramPayments (`Decimal`): Box 4a, Agricultural program payments
- cccLoans (`Decimal`): Box 5a, Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) loans reported under election
- cropInsuranceProceeds (`Decimal`): Box 6a, Crop insurance proceeds and federal crop disaster payments
- customHireIncome (`Decimal`): Box 7, Custom hire (machine work) income
- otherIncome (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 8, Other income
- carAndTruck (`Decimal`): Box 10, Car and truck expenses
- chemicals (`Decimal`): Box 11, Chemicals
- conservation (`Decimal`): Box 12, Conservation expenses
- customHireExpenses (`Decimal`): Box 13, Custom hire (machine work)
- depreciation (`Decimal`): Box 14, Depreciation
- employeeBenefitPrograms (`Decimal`): Box 15, Employee benefit programs
- feed (`Decimal`): Box 16, Feed
- fertilizers (`Decimal`): Box 17, Fertilizers and lime
- freight (`Decimal`): Box 18, Freight and trucking
- fuel (`Decimal`): Box 19, Gasoline, fuel, and oil
- insurance (`Decimal`): Box 20, Insurance (other than health)
- mortgageInterest (`Decimal`): Box 21a, Mortgage Interest
- otherInterest (`Decimal`): Box 21b, Other interest
- laborHired (`Decimal`): Box 22, Labor hired
- pension (`Decimal`): Box 23, Pension and profit-sharing plans
- equipmentRent (`Decimal`): Box 24a, Rent or lease: Vehicles, machinery, equipment
- otherRent (`Decimal`): Box 24b, Rent or lease: Other
- repairs (`Decimal`): Box 25, Repairs and maintenance
- seeds (`Decimal`): Box 26, Seeds and plants
- storage (`Decimal`): Box 27, Storage and warehousing
- supplies (`Decimal`): Box 28, Supplies
- taxes (`Decimal`): Box 29, Taxes
- utilities (`Decimal`): Box 30, Utilities
- veterinary (`Decimal`): Box 31, Veterinary, breeding, and medicine
- otherExpenses (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 32, Other expenses
- capitalExpenditures (`array<Date and Amount>`): Capital expenditures, for use in calculating Depreciation


## Farm Rental Income Statement
Farm Rental Income Statement for IRS Form 4835

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- incomeFromProduction (`Decimal`): Box 1, Income from production of livestock, produce, grains, and other crops
- coopDistributions (`Decimal`): Box 2a, Cooperative distributions
- agProgramPayments (`Decimal`): Box 3a, Agricultural program payments
- cccLoans (`Decimal`): Box 4a, Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) loans reported under election
- cropInsuranceProceeds (`Decimal`): Box 5a, Crop insurance proceeds and federal crop disaster payments
- otherIncome (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 6, Other income
- carAndTruck (`Decimal`): Box 8, Car and truck expenses
- chemicals (`Decimal`): Box 9, Chemicals
- conservation (`Decimal`): Box 10, Conservation expenses
- customHireExpenses (`Decimal`): Box 11, Custom hire (machine work)
- depreciation (`Decimal`): Box 12, Depreciation
- employeeBenefitPrograms (`Decimal`): Box 13, Employee benefit programs
- feed (`Decimal`): Box 14, Feed
- fertilizers (`Decimal`): Box 15, Fertilizers and lime
- freight (`Decimal`): Box 16, Freight and trucking
- fuel (`Decimal`): Box 17, Gasoline, fuel, and oil
- insurance (`Decimal`): Box 18, Insurance (other than health)
- mortgageInterest (`Decimal`): Box 19a, Mortgage Interest
- otherInterest (`Decimal`): Box 19b, Other interest
- laborHired (`Decimal`): Box 20, Labor hired
- pension (`Decimal`): Box 21, Pension and profit-sharing plans
- equipmentRent (`Decimal`): Box 22a, Rent or lease: Vehicles, machinery, equipment
- otherRent (`Decimal`): Box 22b, Rent or lease: Other
- repairs (`Decimal`): Box 23, Repairs and maintenance
- seeds (`Decimal`): Box 24, Seeds and plants
- storage (`Decimal`): Box 25, Storage and warehousing
- supplies (`Decimal`): Box 26, Supplies
- taxes (`Decimal`): Box 27, Taxes
- utilities (`Decimal`): Box 28, Utilities
- veterinary (`Decimal`): Box 29, Veterinary, breeding, and medicine
- otherExpenses (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 30, Other expenses
- capitalExpenditures (`array<Date and Amount>`): Capital expenditures, for use in calculating Depreciation


## FiAttribute Entity
Data provider-specific attribute

### Properties
- name (`String`): Name of attribute
- value (`String`): Value of attribute


## Form 1042-S Agent
One of various persons or businesses involved in Form 1042-S reporting. Use
  * `tin` for
    * Box 12a, Withholding Agent EIN,
    * Box 13e, Recipient U.S. TIN,
    * Box 14b, Primary Withholding Agent EIN,
    * Box 15a, Intermediary or flow-through entity EIN,
    * Box 16b, Payer TIN
  * `individualName` or `businessName` for
    * Box 12d, Withholding Agent name,
    * Box 13a, Recipient name,
    * Box 14a, Primary Withholding Agent name,
    * Box 15d, Intermediary or flow-through entity name,
    * Box 16a, Payer name
  * `address.country` for
    * Box 12f, Withholding Agent Country code,
    * Box 13b, Recipient Country code,
    * Box 15f, Intermediary or flow-through entity Country code
  * `address` for
    * Boxes 12h-i, Withholding Agent Address,
    * Boxes 13c-d, Recipient Address,
    * Boxes 15h-i, Intermediary or flow-through entity Address

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity


## Form 1042-S Recipient
Recipient for Form 1042-S, Boxes 13a-j, 13l

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity
- lobCode (`String`): Box 13j, Recipient's LOB code, if any
- dateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 13l, Recipient's date of birth


## HATEOAS Link
REST application constraint (Hypermedia As The Engine Of Application State)

### Properties
- href (`String`): URL to invoke the action on the resource
- action (`Action`): HTTP Method to use for the request
- types (`array<Type>`): Content-types that can be used in the Accept header.


## Health Insurance Coverage
Used on Form 1095-A Part III

### Properties
- enrollmentPremium (`Decimal`): Monthly enrollment premiums
- slcspPremium (`Decimal`): Monthly second lowest cost silver plan (SLCSP) premium
- advancePremiumTaxCreditPayment (`Decimal`): Monthly advance payment of premium tax credit
- month (`Coverage Month 1`): Month of coverage


## Health Insurance Covered Individual
Used on Form 1095-B Part IV and Form 1095-C Part III

### Properties
- name (`Individual Name 1`): Name of responsible individual
- tin (`String`): Social security number or other TIN
- dateOfBirth (`Date`): Date of birth
- coveredAll12Months (`Boolean`): Covered all 12 months
- coveredMonths (`array<Month Abbreviation>`): Months covered


## Health Insurance Marketplace Covered Individual
Used on Form 1095-A Part II

### Properties
- name (`String`): Covered individual name
- tin (`String`): Covered individual SSN
- dateOfBirth (`Date`): Covered individual date of birth
- policyStartDate (`Date`): Coverage start date
- policyTerminationDate (`Date`): Coverage termination date


## An investment holding


### Properties
- assetClasses (`array<Asset Class>`): Percent breakdown by asset class.
- averageCost (`Boolean`): Cost is average of all purchases for holding.
- cashAccount (`Boolean`): If true, indicates that this holding is used to maintain proceeds from sales, dividends, and other cash postings to the investment account.
- changeInPrice (`Decimal`): Change in current price compared to previous day's close
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- currentUnitPrice (`Decimal`)
- currentUnitPriceDate (`DateTime`): Current unit price as of date
- description (`String`): Description of the holding
- expirationDate (`DateTime`): For CDs, bonds, and other time-based holdings.
- faceValue (`Decimal`): Face value at the time of data retrieved.
- fiAssetClasses (`array<Fi Asset Class>`): Percent breakdown by FI-specific asset class percentage breakdown
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- heldInAccount (`Held in Account`): Sub-account
- holdingId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the holding
- holdingName (`String`): Holding name or security name
- holdingSubType (`Holding Sub Type`)
- holdingType (`Holding Type`)
- inv401kSurce (`Inv 401 K Surce`): Source for money for this security.
- marketValue (`Decimal`): Market value at the time of data retrieved
- originalPurchaseDate (`DateTime`): Date of original purchase
- positionType (`Position Type`)
- purchasedPrice (`Decimal`): Price of holding at the time of purchase
- rate (`Decimal`): For CDs, bonds, and other rate based holdings.
- securityId (`String`): Unique identifier of security
- securityIdType (`Security Id Type`): Security identifier type
- symbol (`String`): Ticker / Market symbol
- taxLots (`array<Tax Lot>`): Breakdown by tax lot.
- units (`Decimal`): Number of shares (with decimals).
- mutualFundSecurity (`Mutual Fund Security Entity`): Information about the mutual fund security specific to the type of security
- optionSecurity (`Option Security Entity`): Information about the option security specific to the type of security
- otherSecurity (`Other Security Entity`): Information about the security specific to the type of security
- stockSecurity (`Stock Security Entity`): Information about the stock security specific to the type of security
- sweepSecurity (`Sweep Security Entity`): Information about the sweep security specific to the type of security
- debtSecurity (`Debt Security Entity`): Information about the debt security specific to the type of security


## Individual name
First name, middle initial, last name, suffix fields

### Properties
- first (`String`): First name
- middle (`String`): Middle initial
- last (`String`): Last name
- suffix (`String`): Generational or academic suffix


## InsuranceAccount
Insurance Account

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- accountCategory (`Account Category`): The account category of the insurance account. Possible enums: DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT, INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT, LOAN_ACCOUNT, LOC_ACCOUNT, INSURANCE_ACCOUNT


## Insurance balances
Data elements included with balances specific to insurance accounts

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- accountCategory (`Account Category`): The account category of the insurance account. Possible enums: DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT, INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT, LOAN_ACCOUNT, LOC_ACCOUNT, INSURANCE_ACCOUNT
- policyCoverageAmount (`Decimal`): Total amount of money the user is insured for.
- policyEndDate (`DateTime`): The premium end date.
- policyPremium (`Decimal`): The amount of the user's premium.
- policyPremiumTerm (`Policy Premium Term`): he payment term for the premium. MONTHLY or ANNUAL.
- policyStartDate (`DateTime`): The premium start date.


## insuranceTransaction
Insurance transactions

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the account currency.

If balanceType is `ASSET`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "+" or not present
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "-"

If balanceType is `LIABILITY`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "-"
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "+" or not present
- category (`String`): Transaction category, preferably MCC or SIC.
- debitCreditMemo (`Debit Credit Memo`): Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.
- description (`String`): The description of the transaction
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt.
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Array of FI-specific attributes
- foreignAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the foreign currency
- foreignCurrency (`String`): The ISO 4217 code of the foreign currency
- lineItem (`array<Line Item>`): Breakdown of the transaction details
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary transaction description
- postedTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was posted to the account. If not provided then TransactionTimestamp can be used as PostedTimeStamp.
- reference (`String`): A tracking reference identifier
- referenceTransactionId (`String`): Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions which are reversals, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.

For reverse postings, the identity of the transaction being reversed. For the correction transaction, the identity of the reversing post. For credit card posting transactions, the identity of the authorization transaction.
- status (`Status 1`): AUTHORIZATION, MEMO, PENDING, or POSTED
- subCategory (`String`): Transaction category detail
- transactionId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the transaction (unique to account). 
Transaction IDs should: 

  1. be the same for pending and posted 
  2. be different for reversed transactions 
  3. `referenceTransactionId` should be present for reversed transactions'
- transactionTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was added to the server backend systems.

Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions to which it applies, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.
- transactionType (`Transaction Type 1`): InsuranceTransaction Type


## interactionType


### Properties
- user
- batch


## InvestmentAccount
Investment Account

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- allowedCheckWriting (`Boolean`): Check writing privileges
- allowedOptionTrade (`Boolean`): Allowed to trade options
- brokerId (`String`): Unique identifier FI
- calendarYearFor401K (`String`): Date for this calendar year for 401K account
- employerName (`String`): Name of the employer in investment 401k Plan
- margin (`Boolean`): Margin trading is allowed
- planId (`String`): Plan number for Investment 401k plan


## Investment balances
Data elements included with balances specific to investment accounts

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- allowedCheckWriting (`Boolean`): Check writing privileges
- allowedOptionTrade (`Boolean`): Allowed to trade options
- brokerId (`String`): Unique identifier FI
- calendarYearFor401K (`String`): Date for this calendar year for 401K account
- employerName (`String`): Name of the employer in investment 401k Plan
- margin (`Boolean`): Margin trading is allowed
- planId (`String`): Plan number for Investment 401k plan
- availableCashBalance (`Decimal`): Cash balance across all sub-accounts. Should include sweep funds.
- balanceAsOf (`DateTime`): As-of date of balances
- balanceList (`array<Investment Balance List>`): Balance List. Name value pair aggregate.
- currentValue (`Decimal`): Total current value of all investments
- dailyChange (`Decimal`): Daily change
- marginBalance (`Decimal`): Margin balance
- percentageChange (`Decimal`): Percentage change
- rolloverAmount (`Decimal`): Rollover amount
- shortBalance (`Decimal`): Short balance


## InvestmentLoan Entity
Information about an investment loan.

### Properties
- loanId (`String`): Unique identifier for this loan
- loanDescription (`String`): Description
- initialLoanBalance (`Decimal`): Initial loan balance amount
- loanStartDate (`DateTime`): Start date of the loan
- currentLoanBalance (`Decimal`): Current loan principal balance amount
- dateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date and time of current loan balance
- loanRate (`Decimal`): Loan annual interest rate for the loan
- loanPaymentAmount (`Decimal`): Loan payment amount
- loanPaymentFrequency (`Loan Payment Frequency`)
- loanPaymentInitial (`Decimal`): Initial number of loan payments
- loanPaymentsRemaining (`Number`): Remaining number of loan payments
- loanMaturityDate (`DateTime`): Expected loan end date
- loanInterestToDate (`Decimal`): Total interest paid to date on this loan
- loanTotalProjectedInterest (`Decimal`): Total projected interest to be paid on this loan
- loanNextPaymentDate (`DateTime`): The next payment date for the loan


## Investment account with all details
Data elements included with the investment product

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- allowedCheckWriting (`Boolean`): Check writing privileges
- allowedOptionTrade (`Boolean`): Allowed to trade options
- brokerId (`String`): Unique identifier FI
- calendarYearFor401K (`String`): Date for this calendar year for 401K account
- employerName (`String`): Name of the employer in investment 401k Plan
- margin (`Boolean`): Margin trading is allowed
- planId (`String`): Plan number for Investment 401k plan
- availableCashBalance (`Decimal`): Cash balance across all sub-accounts. Should include sweep funds.
- balanceAsOf (`DateTime`): As-of date of balances
- balanceList (`array<Investment Balance List>`): Balance List. Name value pair aggregate.
- currentValue (`Decimal`): Total current value of all investments
- dailyChange (`Decimal`): Daily change
- marginBalance (`Decimal`): Margin balance
- percentageChange (`Decimal`): Percentage change
- rolloverAmount (`Decimal`): Rollover amount
- shortBalance (`Decimal`): Short balance
- holdings (`array<An Investment Holding>`): Array of holdings
- openOrders (`array<Open Order Entity>`): Array of open orders
- contribution (`array<Contribution Entity>`): Array of contribution objects. Describes how new contributions are distributed among the available securities
- vesting (`array<Vesting Entity>`): Array of vesting objects. Provides the past, present, and future vesting schedule and percentages
- investmentLoans (`array<Investment Loan Entity>`): Array of investment loans
- pensionSource (`array<Pension Source Entity>`): Array of Pension Source
- equityGrants (`array<Equity Grant>`): Provides equity grant information on Restricted Stock Units, Restricted Stock Awards, Stock Appreciation Right, Stock Options, Performance Awards, and Total Share Return Units


## investmentTransaction
Investment Transactions

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the account currency.

If balanceType is `ASSET`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "+" or not present
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "-"

If balanceType is `LIABILITY`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "-"
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "+" or not present
- category (`String`): Transaction category, preferably MCC or SIC.
- debitCreditMemo (`Debit Credit Memo`): Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.
- description (`String`): The description of the transaction
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt.
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Array of FI-specific attributes
- foreignAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the foreign currency
- foreignCurrency (`String`): The ISO 4217 code of the foreign currency
- lineItem (`array<Line Item>`): Breakdown of the transaction details
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary transaction description
- postedTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was posted to the account. If not provided then TransactionTimestamp can be used as PostedTimeStamp.
- reference (`String`): A tracking reference identifier
- referenceTransactionId (`String`): Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions which are reversals, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.

For reverse postings, the identity of the transaction being reversed. For the correction transaction, the identity of the reversing post. For credit card posting transactions, the identity of the authorization transaction.
- status (`Status 1`): AUTHORIZATION, MEMO, PENDING, or POSTED
- subCategory (`String`): Transaction category detail
- transactionId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the transaction (unique to account). 
Transaction IDs should: 

  1. be the same for pending and posted 
  2. be different for reversed transactions 
  3. `referenceTransactionId` should be present for reversed transactions'
- transactionTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was added to the server backend systems.

Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions to which it applies, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.
- accruedInterest (`Decimal`): Accrued Interest.
- commission (`Decimal`): Transaction commission.
- confirmationNumber (`String`): Confirmation number of the transaction.
- faceValue (`Decimal`): Cash value for bonds.
- fees (`Decimal`): Fees applied to the trade.
- fractionalCash (`Decimal`): Cash for fractional units (used for stock splits).
- gain (`Decimal`): For sales.
- incomeType (`Income Type`): Type of investment income. CGLONG (capital gains-long term), CGSHORT (capital gains-short term), MISC.
- inv401kSource (`Inv 401 K Source 1`): Source of money.
- load (`Decimal`): Load on the transaction.
- loanId (`String`): For 401k accounts only. This indicates the transaction was due to a loan or a loan repayment.
- loanInterest (`Decimal`): How much loan pre-payment is interest.
- loanPrincipal (`Decimal`): How much loan pre-payment is principal.
- markup (`Decimal`): Portion of unit price that is attributed to the dealer markup.
- newUnits (`Decimal`): Number of shares after split.
- oldUnits (`Decimal`): Number of shares before split.
- payrollDate (`String`): The date for the 401k transaction was obtained in payroll.
- penalty (`Decimal`): Indicates amount withheld due to a penalty.
- positionType (`Position Type`)
- price (`Decimal`): Unit purchase price.
- priorYearContrib (`Boolean`): Indicates this buy was made using prior years contribution. TRUE or FALSE.
- runningBalance (`Decimal`): Running balance of the position.
- securityId (`String`): Unique identifier of security.
- securityIdType (`Security Id Type 3`): Security identifier type.
- securityType (`Security Type`)
- shares (`Decimal`): Number of shares (with decimals). Negative numbers indicate securities are being removed from the account.
- splitRatioDenominator (`Decimal`): Split ratio denominator.
- splitRatioNumerator (`Decimal`): Split ratio numerator.
- stateWithholding (`Decimal`): State tax withholding.
- subAccountFund (`Sub Account Fund`): From which account money came in.
- subAccountSec (`Sub Account Sec`): Sub-account security type.
- symbol (`String`): Ticker symbol.
- taxes (`Decimal`): Taxes on the trade.
- taxExempt (`Boolean`): Tax-exempt transaction TRUE or FALSE.
- transactionReason (`Transaction Reason`): Reason for this transaction; CALL (the debt was called), SELL (the debt was sold), MATURITY (the debt reached maturity)
- transactionType (`Transaction Type 2`): InvestmentTransaction Type
- transferAction (`Transfer Action`): Transfer direction.
- unitPrice (`Decimal`): Price per commonly-quoted unit. Does not include markup/markdown, unitprice. Share price for stocks, mutual funds, and others. Percentage of par for bonds. Per share (not contract) for options.
- units (`Decimal`): For security-based actions other than stock splits, quantity. Shares for stocks, mutual funds, and others. Face value for bonds. Contracts for options.
- unitType (`Unit Type 1`)
- withholding (`Decimal`): Federal tax withholding.


## Investment Sale Type
Type of investment sale

### Properties
- CRYPTOCURRENCY
- EMPLOYEE_STOCK_PURCHASE_PLAN
- INCENTIVE_STOCK_OPTION
- NONQUALIFIED_STOCK_OPTIONS
- OTHER
- RESTRICTED_STOCK
- RESTRICTED_STOCK_UNITS

Change log is at [ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency](https://www.iso.org/fr/committee/48750.html?t=3V3rukDb61p05Wd6ojyTRvE0S3Yg_fZgUjrLjHWcd9-mDmTKHOGjbX3nEJ3SqHar&view=documents#section-isodocuments-top)
