## LineItem


### Properties
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money attributable to this line item
- checkNumber (`Decimal`): Check number
- description (`String`): The description of the line item
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary item description
- reference (`String`): A reference number


## LoanAccount
Loan Account

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- compoundingPeriod (`Compounding Period`)
- loanTerm (`Number`): Term of loan in months
- maturityDate (`DateTime`): Maturity date
- originatingDate (`DateTime`): Loan origination date
- paymentFrequency (`Payment Frequency`)
- totalNumberOfPayments (`Number`): Total number of payments


## Loan balances
Data elements included with balances specific to loan accounts

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- compoundingPeriod (`Compounding Period`)
- loanTerm (`Number`): Term of loan in months
- maturityDate (`DateTime`): Maturity date
- originatingDate (`DateTime`): Loan origination date
- paymentFrequency (`Payment Frequency`)
- totalNumberOfPayments (`Number`): Total number of payments
- balanceAsOf (`DateTime`): As-of date of balances
- escrowBalance (`Decimal`): Escrow balance of loan
- interestPaidYearToDate (`Decimal`): Interest paid year to date
- lastPaymentAmount (`Decimal`): Last payment amount
- lastPaymentDate (`DateTime`): Last payment date
- nextPaymentAmount (`Decimal`): Amount of next payment
- nextPaymentDate (`DateTime`): Date of next payment
- originalPrincipal (`Decimal`): Original principal of loan
- payOffAmount (`Decimal`): Payoff amount
- principalBalance (`Decimal`): Principal balance of loan


## Loan Transaction
Loan Transaction

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the account currency.

If balanceType is `ASSET`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "+" or not present
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "-"

If balanceType is `LIABILITY`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "-"
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "+" or not present
- category (`String`): Transaction category, preferably MCC or SIC.
- debitCreditMemo (`Debit Credit Memo`): Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.
- description (`String`): The description of the transaction
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt.
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Array of FI-specific attributes
- foreignAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the foreign currency
- foreignCurrency (`String`): The ISO 4217 code of the foreign currency
- lineItem (`array<Line Item>`): Breakdown of the transaction details
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary transaction description
- postedTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was posted to the account. If not provided then TransactionTimestamp can be used as PostedTimeStamp.
- reference (`String`): A tracking reference identifier
- referenceTransactionId (`String`): Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions which are reversals, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.

For reverse postings, the identity of the transaction being reversed. For the correction transaction, the identity of the reversing post. For credit card posting transactions, the identity of the authorization transaction.
- status (`Status 1`): AUTHORIZATION, MEMO, PENDING, or POSTED
- subCategory (`String`): Transaction category detail
- transactionId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the transaction (unique to account). 
Transaction IDs should: 

  1. be the same for pending and posted 
  2. be different for reversed transactions 
  3. `referenceTransactionId` should be present for reversed transactions'
- transactionTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was added to the server backend systems.

Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions to which it applies, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.
- paymentDetails (`Payment Details`): Payment details for some transactions
- transactionType (`Transaction Type 3`): LoanTransaction Type


## Local Tax Withholding
Income in a locality and its tax withholding

### Properties
- taxWithheld (`Decimal`): Amount of local income tax withheld
- localityName (`String`): Locality name
- income (`Decimal`): Income amount for local tax purposes


## Line of credit balances
Data elements included with balances specific to line of credit accounts

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the account. Not an account number. This identity must be unique to the owning institution.
- accountType (`String`): The type of an account. For instance, CHECKING, SAVINGS, 401K, etc.
- accountNumberDisplay (`String`): Account display number for the end user‚Äôs handle at owning institution. This is to be displayed by the Interface Provider.
- currency (`Currency Entity`): Indicates the currency code used by the account. May also include currency rate.
- description (`String`)
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`)
- nickname (`String`): Name given by the user. Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- productName (`String`): Marketed product name for this account.  Used in UIs to assist in account selection
- status (`Status`): The status of an account.
- lineOfBusiness (`String`): The line of business, such as consumer, consumer joint, small business, corporate, etc.
- balanceType (`Balance Type`): ASSET (positive transaction amount increases balance), LIABILITY (positive transaction amount decreases balance)
- interestRate (`Decimal`): Interest Rate of Account
- interestRateType (`Interest Rate Type`): The type of interest rate. FIXED or VARIABLE.
- interestRateAsOf (`DateTime`): Date of account‚Äôs interest rate
- lastActivityDate (`DateTime`): Date that last transaction occurred on account
- micrNumber (`String`): MICR Number
- parentAccountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the parent account. This is used to group accounts.
- priorInterestRate (`Decimal`): Previous Interest Rate of Account
- transferIn (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for incoming transfers
- transferOut (`Boolean`): Account is eligible for outgoing transfers
- balanceAsOf (`DateTime`): As-of date of balances
- advancesApr (`Decimal`): Advances APR
- availableCash (`Decimal`): Available cash
- availableCredit (`Decimal`): Available credit
- cashAdvanceLimit (`Decimal`): Cash advance limit
- creditLine (`Decimal`): Credit limit
- currentBalance (`Decimal`): Current balance LOC
- currentRewardsBalance (`Decimal`): Current rewards balance
- financeCharges (`Decimal`): Finance charges
- lastPaymentAmount (`Decimal`): Last payment amount
- lastPaymentDate (`DateTime`): Last payment date
- lastStmtBalance (`Decimal`): Last Statement Balance
- lastStmtDate (`DateTime`): Last Statement Date
- minimumPaymentAmount (`Decimal`): Minimum payment amount
- nextPaymentAmount (`Decimal`): Amount of next payment
- nextPaymentDate (`DateTime`): Due date of next payment
- pastDueAmount (`Decimal`): Past Due Amount
- pointsAccrued (`Decimal`): Points accrued
- principalBalance (`Decimal`): Principal balance
- pointsRedeemed (`Decimal`): Points redeemed
- purchasesApr (`Decimal`): Purchases APR


## LocTransaction
A line of credit transaction of type

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the account currency.

If balanceType is `ASSET`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "+" or not present
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "-"

If balanceType is `LIABILITY`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "-"
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "+" or not present
- category (`String`): Transaction category, preferably MCC or SIC.
- debitCreditMemo (`Debit Credit Memo`): Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.
- description (`String`): The description of the transaction
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt.
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Array of FI-specific attributes
- foreignAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the foreign currency
- foreignCurrency (`String`): The ISO 4217 code of the foreign currency
- lineItem (`array<Line Item>`): Breakdown of the transaction details
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary transaction description
- postedTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was posted to the account. If not provided then TransactionTimestamp can be used as PostedTimeStamp.
- reference (`String`): A tracking reference identifier
- referenceTransactionId (`String`): Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions which are reversals, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.

For reverse postings, the identity of the transaction being reversed. For the correction transaction, the identity of the reversing post. For credit card posting transactions, the identity of the authorization transaction.
- status (`Status 1`): AUTHORIZATION, MEMO, PENDING, or POSTED
- subCategory (`String`): Transaction category detail
- transactionId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the transaction (unique to account). 
Transaction IDs should: 

  1. be the same for pending and posted 
  2. be different for reversed transactions 
  3. `referenceTransactionId` should be present for reversed transactions'
- transactionTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was added to the server backend systems.

Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions to which it applies, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.
- checkNumber (`Number`): Check number
- paymentDetails (`Payment Details`): Payment details for some transactions
- transactionType (`Transaction Type 4`): LocTransaction Type


## Mode
Indicates format of returned data.
'raw' = provider-specific;
'standard' = FDX-aligned values (BETA)

### Properties
- raw
- standard


## Month Abbreviation
Used by MonthAmount

### Properties
- JAN
- FEB
- MAR
- APR
- MAY
- JUN
- JUL
- AUG
- SEP
- OCT
- NOV
- DEC


## Month and Amount
Month and amount pair used on IRS Form 1099-K, etc.

### Properties
- month (`Month Abbreviation 1`): Month
- amount (`Decimal`): Amount


## MutualFundSecurity Entity
Information about the mutual fund security specific to the type of security

### Properties
- mutualFundType (`Mutual Fund Type`): Mutual fund type
- unitsStreet (`Decimal`): Units in the FI's street name, positive quantity
- unitsUser (`Decimal`): Units in user's name directly, positive  quantity
- reinvestDividends (`Boolean`): Reinvest dividends
- reinvestCapitalGains (`Boolean`): Reinvest capital gains
- yield (`Decimal`): Current yield reported as portion of the fund's assets
- yieldAsOfDate (`DateTime`): As-of date for yield value


## Name and Address
Individual or business name with address

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code
- name1 (`String`): Name line 1
- name2 (`String`): Name line 2


## Name, Address and Phone
Contact phone number with name and address

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code
- name1 (`String`): Name line 1
- name2 (`String`): Name line 2
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 1`): Phone number


## Offer of Health Insurance Coverage
Health insurance coverage offer for part II of IRS Form 1095-C

### Properties
- coverageCode (`String`): Offer of Coverage (enter required code)
- requiredContribution (`Decimal`): Employee required contribution
- section4980HCode (`String`): Section 4980H Safe Harbor and Other Relief (enter code)
- postalCode (`String`): Box 17, ZIP Code
- month (`Coverage Month 2`): Month


## OpenOrder Entity
Information on an open order.

### Properties
- orderId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the order. Id for this order transaction.
- securityId (`String`): Unique identifier of the security.
- securityIdType (`Security Id Type`): Security identifier type
- symbol (`String`): Market symbol
- description (`String`): Description of order
- units (`Decimal`): Number of units (shares, bonds, etc.)
- orderType (`Order Type`): Type of order.
- orderDate (`DateTime`): Order date
- unitPrice (`Decimal`): Unit price
- unitType (`Unit Type`): Type of unit.
- orderDuration (`Order Duration`): This order is good for DAY, GOODTILLCANCEL, IMMEDIATE
- subAccount (`Sub Account`)
- limitPrice (`Decimal`): Limit Price
- stopPrice (`Decimal`): Stop price
- inv401kSource (`Inv 401 K Source`): For 401(k) accounts, source of money for this order. Default if not present is OTHERNONVEST.


## OptionSecurity Entity
Information about the option security specific to the type of security

### Properties
- secured (`Secured`): How the option is secured
- optionType (`Option Type`)
- strikePrice (`Decimal`): Strike price / Unit price
- expireDate (`DateTime`): Expiration date of option
- sharesPerContract (`Decimal`): Shares per contract


## OtherSecurity Entity
Information about the security specific to the type of security

### Properties
- typeDescription (`String`): Description of Other Security


## paginatedArray


### Properties
- links (`Links`)


## PaymentDetails
Payment details for some transactions

### Properties
- escrowAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of payment applied to escrow
- feesAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of payment applied to fees
- insuranceAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of payment applied to life/health/accident insurance on the loan
- interestAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of payment applied to interest
- pmiAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of payment applied to PMI
- principalAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of payment applied to principal


## PensionSource Entity
Information about a pension source.

### Properties
- displayName (`String`): Name of the Source
- amount (`Decimal`): Benefit Amount
- paymentOption (`String`): Form of payment
- asOfDate (`DateTime`): Date benefit was calculated
- frequency (`Frequency`)
- startDate (`DateTime`): Assumed retirement date ‚Äê As of date amount is payable


## Rental Income Statement
Rental Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule E

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- propertyAddress (`Address 3`): Box 1a, Physical address of property (street, city, state, ZIP code)
- rents (`Decimal`): Box 3, Rents received
- advertising (`Decimal`): Box 5, Advertising
- auto (`Decimal`): Box 6, Auto and travel
- cleaning (`Decimal`): Box 7, Cleaning and maintenance
- commissions (`Decimal`): Box 8, Commissions
- insurance (`Decimal`): Box 9, Insurance
- legal (`Decimal`): Box 10, Legal and other professional fees
- managementFees (`Decimal`): Box 11, Management fees
- mortgageInterest (`Decimal`): Box 12, Mortgage interest paid to banks, etc.
- otherInterest (`Decimal`): Box 13, Other interest
- repairs (`Decimal`): Box 14, Repairs
- supplies (`Decimal`): Box 15, Supplies
- taxes (`Decimal`): Box 16, Taxes
- utilities (`Decimal`): Box 17, Utilities
- depreciationExpense (`Decimal`): Box 18, Depreciation
- otherExpenses (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 19, Other expenses
- capitalExpenditures (`array<Date and Amount>`): Capital expenditures, for use in calculating Depreciation


## Result Type
Flag to indicate if you want a lightweight array of metadata (AccountDescriptor or Tax or Operations) or full item details (Account or a Tax subclass or Availability details). If set to 'lightweight', should only return the fields associated with the metadata entity.

### Properties
- details
- lightweight


## Royalty Income Statement
Royalty Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule E

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- propertyAddress (`Address 3`): Box 1a, Physical address of property (street, city, state, ZIP code)
- royalties (`Decimal`): Box 3, Royalties received
- advertising (`Decimal`): Box 5, Advertising
- auto (`Decimal`): Box 6, Auto and travel
- cleaning (`Decimal`): Box 7, Cleaning and maintenance
- commissions (`Decimal`): Box 8, Commissions
- insurance (`Decimal`): Box 9, Insurance
- legal (`Decimal`): Box 10, Legal and other professional fees
- managementFees (`Decimal`): Box 11, Management fees
- mortgageInterest (`Decimal`): Box 12, Mortgage interest paid to banks, etc.
- otherInterest (`Decimal`): Box 13, Other interest
- repairs (`Decimal`): Box 14, Repairs
- supplies (`Decimal`): Box 15, Supplies
- taxes (`Decimal`): Box 16, Taxes
- utilities (`Decimal`): Box 17, Utilities
- depletionExpense (`Decimal`): Box 18, Depletion
- otherExpenses (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 19, Other expenses
- capitalExpenditures (`array<Date and Amount>`): Capital expenditures, for use in calculating Depreciation


## Sale Proceeds Type
Gross or net proceeds. Used by Form 1099-B

### Properties
- GROSS
- NET


## Sale Term Type
Long or short term. Used by Form 1099-B

### Properties
- LONG
- SHORT


## Security Detail, IRS Form 1099-B
Tax information for a single security transaction

### Properties
- checkboxOnForm8949 (`String`): Applicable checkbox on Form 8949
- securityName (`String`): Security name
- numberOfShares (`Decimal`): Number of shares
- saleDescription (`String`): Box 1a, Description of property
- dateAcquired (`Date`): Box 1b, Date acquired
- variousDatesAcquired (`Boolean`): Box 1b, Date acquired Various
- dateOfSale (`Date`): Box 1c, Date sold or disposed
- salesPrice (`Decimal`): Box 1d, Proceeds (not price per share)
- accruedMarketDiscount (`Decimal`): Box 1f, Accrued market discount
- adjustmentCodes (`array<Code and Amount>`): Other adjustments (code and amount)
- costBasis (`Decimal`): Box 1e, Cost or other basis
- correctedCostBasis (`Decimal`): Corrected cost basis. May be supplied in lieu of adjustmentCode code B. If both adjustmentCodes and correctedCostBasis are supplied, costBasis plus adjustmentCode B should equal correctedCostBasis
- washSaleLossDisallowed (`Decimal`): Box 1g, Wash sale loss disallowed
- longOrShort (`Sale Term Type 2`): Box 2, LONG or SHORT
- ordinary (`Boolean`): Box 2, Ordinary
- collectible (`Boolean`): Box 3, Collectibles
- qof (`Boolean`): Box 3, Qualified Opportunity Fund (QOF)
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- noncoveredSecurity (`Boolean`): Box 5, Noncovered security
- grossOrNet (`Sale Proceeds Type 1`): Box 6, Reported to IRS: GROSS or NET
- lossNotAllowed (`Boolean`): Box 7, Loss not allowed based on proceeds
- basisReported (`Boolean`): Box 12, Basis reported to IRS
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 14-16, State and Local tax withholding
- cusip (`String`): CUSIP number
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): Foreign account tax compliance
- expiredOption (`Expired Option Type 1`): To indicate gain or loss resulted from option expiration. If salesPrice (1d, proceeds) is zero, use PURCHASED. If costBasis (1e) is zero, use GRANTED
- investmentSaleType (`Investment Sale Type`): Type of investment sale


## State and Local Tax Withholding
Income in a state and/or locality and its or their tax withholding

### Properties
- stateCode (`State Code 2`): State two-digit code
- state (`State Tax Withholding 2`): Amount of state income tax withheld
- local (`Local Tax Withholding 1`): Amount of local income tax withheld, if any


## State Code
The codes for U.S. states, possessions and military overseas addresses. From [USPS Publication 28 - Postal Addressing Standards](https://pe.usps.com/text/pub28/28apb.htm) and [IRS Zip Code and State Abbreviations](https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-utl/zip_code_and_state_abbreviations.pdf). Includes codes for 50 states and District of Columbia plus:
  * AA - Armed Forces Americas (except Canada)
  * AE - Armed Forces Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and Canada
  * AP - Armed Forces Pacific
  * AS - American Samoa
  * FM - Federated States of Micronesia
  * GU - Guam
  * MH - Marshall Islands
  * MP - Northern Mariana Islands
  * PR - Puerto Rico
  * PW - Palau
  * VI - U.S. Virgin Islands

### Properties
- AA
- AE
- AK
- AL
- AP
- AR
- AS
- AZ
- CA
- CO
- CT
- DC
- DE
- FL
- FM
- GA
- GU
- HI
- IA
- ID
- IL
- IN
- KS
- KY
- LA
- MA
- MD
- ME
- MH
- MI
- MN
- MO
- MP
- MS
- MT
- NC
- ND
- NE
- NH
- NJ
- NM
- NV
- NY
- OH
- OK
- OR
- PA
- PR
- PW
- RI
- SC
- SD
- TN
- TX
- UT
- VA
- VI
- VT
- WA
- WI
- WV
- WY


## State Tax Withholding
Income in a state and its tax withholding

### Properties
- taxWithheld (`Decimal`): Amount of state income tax withheld
- taxId (`String`): Filer's state tax id
- income (`Decimal`): Income amount for state tax purposes


## StockSecurity Entity
Information about the stock security specific to the type of security

### Properties
- unitsStreet (`Decimal`): Units in the FI's street name, positive quantity
- unitsUser (`Decimal`): Units in user's name directly, positive  quantity
- reinvestDividends (`Boolean`): Reinvest dividends
- stockType (`Stock Type`)
- yield (`Decimal`): Current yield
- yieldAsOfDate (`DateTime`): Yield as-of date


## SweepSecurity Entity
Information about the sweep security specific to the type of security

### Properties
- currentBalance (`Decimal`): Balance of funds in account
- availableBalance (`Decimal`): Balance of funds available for use
- balanceAsOf (`DateTime`): As-of date of balances
- checks (`Boolean`): Whether or not checks can be written on the account


## taxlotsResponse


### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- holding (`Holding`)


## Tax Data
Tax data container for API requests and responses

### Properties
- businessIncomeStatement (`Business Income Statement`): Business Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule C
- cryptocurrencyTaxStatement (`Cryptocurrency Tax Statement List 1`): Cryptocurrency Tax Statement list
- farmIncomeStatement (`Farm Income Statement`): Farm Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule F
- farmRentalIncomeStatement (`Farm Rental Income Statement`): Farm Rental Income Statement for IRS Form 4835
- rentalIncomeStatement (`Rental Income Statement`): Rental Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule E
- royaltyIncomeStatement (`Royalty Income Statement`): Royalty Income Statement for IRS Form 1040 Schedule E
- tax1041K1 (`Form 1041 K-12`): Beneficiary's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc.
- tax1042S (`Form 1042 -S2`): Foreign Person's U.S. Source Income Subject to Withholding
- tax1065K1 (`Form 1065 K-12`): Partner's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc.
- tax1095A (`Form 1095 -A2`): Health Insurance Marketplace Statement
- tax1095B (`Form 1095 -B2`): Health Coverage
- tax1095C (`Form 1095 -C2`): Employer-Provided Health Insurance Offer and Coverage
- tax1097Btc (`Form 1097 -BTC2`): Bond Tax Credit
- tax1098 (`Form 10982`): Mortgage Interest Statement
- tax1098C (`Form 1098 -C2`): Contributions of Motor Vehicles, Boats, and Airplanes
- tax1098E (`Form 1098 -E2`): Student Loan Interest Statement
- tax1098Ma (`Form 1098 -MA2`): Mortgage Assistance Payments
- tax1098Q (`Form 1098 -Q2`): Qualifying Longevity Annuity Contract Information
- tax1098T (`Form 1098 -T2`): Tuition Statement
- tax1099A (`Form 1099 -A2`): Acquisition or Abandonment of Secured Property
- tax1099B (`Form 1099 -B2`): Proceeds From Broker and Barter Exchange Transactions
- tax1099C (`Form 1099 -C2`): Cancellation of Debt
- tax1099Cap (`Form 1099 -CAP2`): Changes in Corporate Control and Capital Structure
- tax1099ConsolidatedStatement (`Form 1099 Consolidated Statement 2`): Consolidated Statement for combined IRS Form 1099s
- tax1099Div (`Form 1099 -DIV2`): Dividends and Distributions
- tax1099G (`Form 1099 -G2`): Certain Government Payments
- tax1099H (`Form 1099 -H2`): Health Coverage Tax Credit (HCTC) Advance Payments
- tax1099Int (`Form 1099 -INT2`): Interest Income
- tax1099K (`Form 1099 -K2`): Merchant Card and Third-Party Network Payments
- tax1099Ls (`Form 1099 -LS2`): Reportable Life Insurance Sale
- tax1099Ltc (`Form 1099 -LTC2`): Long-Term Care and Accelerated Death Benefits
- tax1099Misc (`Form 1099 -MISC2`): Miscellaneous Income
- tax1099Nec (`Form 1099 -NEC2`): Nonemployee Compensation
- tax1099Oid (`Form 1099 -OID2`): Original Issue Discount
- tax1099Patr (`Form 1099 -PATR2`): Taxable Distributions Received From Cooperatives
- tax1099Q (`Form 1099 -Q2`): Payments From Qualified Education Programs
- tax1099Qa (`Form 1099 -QA2`): Distributions From ABLE Accounts
- tax1099R (`Form 1099 -R2`): Distributions from Pensions, Annuities, Retirement or Profit-Sharing Plans, IRAs, Insurance Contracts, etc.
- tax1099S (`Form 1099 -S2`): Proceeds From Real Estate Transactions
- tax1099Sa (`Form 1099 -SA2`): Distributions From an HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage MSA
- tax1099Sb (`Form 1099 -SB2`): Seller's Investment in Life Insurance Contract
- tax1120SK1 (`Form 1120 -S K-12`): Shareholder's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc.
- tax2439 (`Form 24392`): Notice to Shareholder of Undistributed Long-Term Capital Gains
- tax3921 (`Form 39212`): Exercise of an Incentive Stock Option Under Section 422(b)
- tax3922 (`Form 39222`): Transfer of Stock Acquired Through an Employee Stock Purchase Plan under Section 423(c)
- tax5227K1 (`Form 1041 K-1`): Split-Interest Trust Beneficiary's schedule K-1
- tax5498 (`Form 54982`): IRA Contribution Information
- tax5498Esa (`Form 5498 -ESA2`): Coverdell ESA Contribution Information
- tax5498Qa (`Form 5498 -QA2`): ABLE Account Contribution Information
- tax5498Sa (`Form 5498 -SA2`): HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage MSA Information
- taxW2 (`Form W-24`): Wage and Tax Statement
- taxW2C (`Form W-2 C 2`): IRS form W-2c, Corrected Wage and Tax Statement
- taxW2G (`Form W-2 G2`): Certain Gambling Winnings
- taxRefundDirectDeposit (`Tax Refund Direct Deposit 2`): Tax refund direct deposit information


## Type Data Type
Specify which data type is requested using TaxDataTypeQuery parameter, to receive 'JSON' formatted tax data in `forms` property or PDF-formatted tax data encoded as Base64 in `pdf` property ('BASE64_PDF'). In TaxStatement response entity indicates which tax data property was returned

### Properties
- BASE64_PDF
- JSON

## transaction
Transaction elements

### Properties
- accountId (`String`): Corresponds to AccountId in Account
- amount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the account currency.

If balanceType is `ASSET`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "+" or not present
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "-"

If balanceType is `LIABILITY`:

  1. If `debitCreditMemo` = `DEBIT`, sign is "-"
  2. If `CREDIT`, sign is "+" or not present
- category (`String`): Transaction category, preferably MCC or SIC.
- debitCreditMemo (`Debit Credit Memo`): Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.
- description (`String`): The description of the transaction
- imageIds (`array<String>`): Array of image identifiers (unique to transaction) used to retrieve images of check or transaction receipt.
- fiAttributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Array of FI-specific attributes
- foreignAmount (`Decimal`): The amount of money in the foreign currency
- foreignCurrency (`String`): The ISO 4217 code of the foreign currency
- lineItem (`array<Line Item>`): Breakdown of the transaction details
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links (unique to this Transaction) used to retrieve images of checks or transaction receipts, or invoke other APIs
- memo (`String`): Secondary transaction description
- postedTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was posted to the account. If not provided then TransactionTimestamp can be used as PostedTimeStamp.
- reference (`String`): A tracking reference identifier
- referenceTransactionId (`String`): Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions which are reversals, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.

For reverse postings, the identity of the transaction being reversed. For the correction transaction, the identity of the reversing post. For credit card posting transactions, the identity of the authorization transaction.
- status (`Status 1`): AUTHORIZATION, MEMO, PENDING, or POSTED
- subCategory (`String`): Transaction category detail
- transactionId (`String`): Long term persistent identity of the transaction (unique to account). 
Transaction IDs should: 

  1. be the same for pending and posted 
  2. be different for reversed transactions 
  3. `referenceTransactionId` should be present for reversed transactions'
- transactionTimestamp (`DateTime`): The date and time that the transaction was added to the server backend systems.

Akoya ensures that this field is populated for all transactions to which it applies, otherwise it is null. Either way it is always present.


## Transactions Entity
Optionally paginated array of transactions

### Properties
- links (`Links`)
- transactions (`array<Transaction¬†1 | Transaction¬†11 | Transaction¬†12 | Transaction¬†13 | Transaction¬†14>`): An array of transactions with entity types dependent on the account type (deposit, investment, loan, or line of credit)


## Tax
Base entity for all IRS Tax forms

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs


## Form 1041 K-1
Beneficiary's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc., from Estate or Trust (boxes A-B as issuer) and Fiduciary (box C) to Beneficiary (boxes F-G as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- finalK1 (`Boolean`): Final K-1
- amendedK1 (`Boolean`): Amended K-1
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end date
- form1041T (`Boolean`): Box D, Check if Form 1041-T was filed
- date1041T (`Date`): Box D, and enter the date it was filed
- final1041 (`Boolean`): Box E, Check if this is the final Form 1041 for the estate or trust
- domestic (`Boolean`): Box H, Domestic beneficiary
- foreign (`Boolean`): Box H, Foreign beneficiary
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Interest income
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 2a, Ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 2b, Qualified dividends
- netShortTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 3, Net short-term capital gain
- netLongTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 4a, Net long-term capital gain
- gain28Rate (`Decimal`): Box 4b, 28% rate gain
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 4c, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- otherPortfolioIncome (`Decimal`): Box 5, Other portfolio and nonbusiness income
- ordinaryBusinessIncome (`Decimal`): Box 6, Ordinary business income
- netRentalRealEstateIncome (`Decimal`): Box 7, Net rental real estate income
- otherRentalIncome (`Decimal`): Box 8, Other rental income
- directlyApportionedDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 9, Directly apportioned deductions
- estateTaxDeduction (`Decimal`): Box 10, Estate tax deduction
- finalYearDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 11, Final year deductions
- fiduciary (`Tax Party 2`): Box C, Fiduciary's name and address
- amtAdjustments (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Alternative minimum tax adjustment
- credits (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 13, Credits and credit recapture
- otherInfo (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 14, Other information


## Form 1042-S
Foreign Person's U.S. Source Income Subject to Withholding, from WithholdingAgent (boxes 12a-i) to Recipient (boxes 13a-j, 13l as form1042Recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- formId (`String`): Unique form identifier
- amended (`Boolean`): Amended
- amendmentNumber (`Number`): Amendment number
- incomeTypeCode (`String`): Box 1, Income code
- grossIncome (`Decimal`): Box 2, Gross income
- chapterIndicator (`String`): Box 3, Chapter indicator
- ch3ExemptionCode (`String`): Box 3a, Exemption code
- ch3TaxRate (`Decimal`): Box 3b, Tax rate
- ch4ExemptionCode (`String`): Box 4a, Exemption code
- ch4TaxRate (`Decimal`): Box 4b, Tax rate
- withholdingAllowance (`Decimal`): Box 5, Withholding allowance
- netIncome (`Decimal`): Box 6, Net income
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 7a, Federal tax withheld
- escrowProceduresApplied (`Boolean`): Box 7b, Check if federal tax withheld was not deposited with the IRS because escrow procedures were applied
- subsequentYear (`Boolean`): Box 7c, Check if withholding occurred in subsequent year with respect to a partnership interest
- otherAgentsTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 8, Tax withheld by other agents
- recipientRepaidAmount (`Decimal`): Box 9, Overwithheld tax repaid to recipient pursuant to adjustment procedures
- totalTaxWithholdingCredit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Total withholding credit
- withholdingAgentTaxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 11, Tax paid by withholding agent (amounts not withheld)
- withholdingAgent (`Form 1042 -S Agent 1`): Boxes 12a-i, Withholding agent
- form1042Recipient (`Form 1042 -S Recipient 1`): Boxes 13a-j, 13l, Recipient for Form 1042-S
- accountNumber (`String`): Box 13k, Recipient account number
- primary (`Form 1042 -S Agent 2`): Boxes 14a-b, Primary Withholding Agent
- prorataBasisReporting (`Boolean`): Box 15, Check if pro-rata basis reporting
- intermediary (`Form 1042 -S Agent 3`): Boxes 15a-i, Intermediary or flow thru entity
- payer (`Form 1042 -S Agent 4`): Boxes 16a-e, Payer
- stateAndLocal (`State and Local Tax Withholding 1`): Box 17, State and Local tax withholding


## Form 1065 K-1
Partner's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc., from Partnership (boxes A, D as issuer) to Partner (boxes E-F as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end data
- finalK1 (`Boolean`): Final K-1
- amendedK1 (`Boolean`): Amended K-1
- irsCenter (`String`): Box C, IRS Center where partnership filed return
- publiclyTraded (`Boolean`): Box D, Check if this is a publicly traded partnership (PTP)
- generalPartner (`Boolean`): Box G, General partner or LLC member-manager
- limitedPartner (`Boolean`): Box G, Limited partner or other LLC member
- domestic (`Boolean`): Box H1, Domestic partner
- foreign (`Boolean`): Box H1, Foreign partner
- disregardedEntity (`Boolean`): Box H2, Check if the partner is a disregarded entity (DE), and enter the partner's TIN and Name
- disregardedEntityTin (`String`): Box H2, Disregarded entity partner's TIN
- disregardedEntityName (`String`): Box H2, Disregarded entity partner's Name
- entityType (`String`): Box I1, What type of entity is this partner?
- retirementPlan (`Boolean`): Box I2, If this partner is a retirement plan (IRA/SEP/Keogh/etc.), check here
- profitShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of profit - beginning
- profitShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of profit - ending
- lossShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of loss - beginning
- lossShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of loss - ending
- capitalShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of capital - beginning
- capitalShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of capital - ending
- decreaseDueToSaleOrExchange (`Boolean`): Box J, Check if decrease is due to sale or exchange of partnership interest. Deprecated and no longer used beginning tax year 2023. Use `decreaseDueToSale` and `decreaseDueToExchange` instead
- decreaseDueToSale (`Boolean`): Box J, Check if decrease is due to sale of partnership interest
- decreaseDueToExchange (`Boolean`): Box J, Check if decrease is due to exchange of partnership interest
- nonrecourseLiabilityShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - beginning - nonrecourse
- nonrecourseLiabilityShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - ending - nonrecourse
- qualifiedLiabilityShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - beginning - qualified nonrecourse financing
- qualifiedLiabilityShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - ending - qualified nonrecourse financing
- recourseLiabilityShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - beginning - recourse
- recourseLiabilityShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - ending - recourse
- includesLowerTierLiability (`Boolean`): Box K2, Check this box if item K1 includes liability amounts from lower tier partnerships
- liabilitySubjectToGuarantees (`Boolean`): Box K3, Check if any of the above liability is subject to guarantees or other payment obligations by the partner
- capitalAccountBegin (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Beginning capital account
- capitalAccountContributions (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Capital contributed during the year
- capitalAccountIncrease (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Current year net income (loss)
- capitalAccountOther (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Other increase (decrease)
- capitalAccountWithdrawals (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Withdrawals & distributions
- capitalAccountEnd (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Ending capital account
- builtInGain (`Boolean`): Box M, Did the partner contribute property with a built-in gain or loss? - Yes
- unrecognizedSection704Begin (`Decimal`): Box N, Partner's Share of Net Unrecognized Section 704(c) Gain or (Loss) - beginning
- unrecognizedSection704End (`Decimal`): Box N, Partner's Share of Net Unrecognized Section 704(c) Gain or (Loss) - ending
- ordinaryIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Ordinary business income (loss)
- netRentalRealEstateIncome (`Decimal`): Box 2, Net rental real estate income (loss)
- otherRentalIncome (`Decimal`): Box 3, Other net rental income (loss)
- guaranteedPaymentServices (`Decimal`): Box 4a, Guaranteed payments for services
- guaranteedPaymentCapital (`Decimal`): Box 4b, Guaranteed payments for capital
- guaranteedPayment (`Decimal`): Box 4c, Total guaranteed payments
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 5, Interest income
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 6a, Ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 6b, Qualified dividends
- dividendEquivalents (`Decimal`): Box 6c, Dividend equivalents
- royalties (`Decimal`): Box 7, Royalties
- netShortTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 8, Net short-term capital gain (loss)
- netLongTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 9a, Net long-term capital gain (loss)
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 9b, Collectibles (28%) gain (loss)
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 9c, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- net1231Gain (`Decimal`): Box 10, Net section 1231 gain (loss)
- otherIncome (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 11, Other income
- section179Deduction (`Decimal`): Box 12, Section 179 deduction
- otherDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 13, Other deductions
- selfEmployment (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 14, Self-employment earnings (loss)
- credits (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 15, Credits
- scheduleK3 (`Boolean`): Box 16, Schedule K-3 is attached
- amtItems (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 17, Alternative minimum tax (AMT) items
- taxExemptIncome (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 18, Tax-exempt income and nondeductible expenses
- distributions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 19, Distributions
- otherInfo (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 20, Other information
- foreignTaxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 21, Foreign taxes paid or accrued
- multipleAtRiskActivities (`Boolean`): Box 22, More than one activity for at-risk purposes
- multiplePassiveActivities (`Boolean`): Box 23, More than one activity for passive activity purposes


## Form 1095-A
Health Insurance Marketplace Statement, to Recipient (boxes 4-5, 12-15)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- marketplaceId (`String`): Box 1, Marketplace identifier
- marketplacePolicyNumber (`String`): Box 2, Marketplace-assigned policy number
- policyIssuerName (`String`): Box 3, Policy issuer's name
- recipientDateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 6, Recipient's date of birth
- spouseName (`String`): Box 7, Recipient's spouse's name
- spouseTin (`String`): Box 8, Recipient's spouse's SSN
- spouseDateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 9, Recipient's spouse's date of birth
- policyStartDate (`Date`): Box 10, Policy start date
- policyTerminationDate (`Date`): Box 11, Policy termination date
- coveredIndividuals (`array<Health Insurance Marketplace Covered Individual>`): Boxes 16+, Covered Individuals
- coverages (`array<Health Insurance Coverage>`): Boxes 21-33, Coverage Information


## Form 1095-B
Health Coverage, from Issuer (boxes 16-22) to Responsible Individual (boxes 1-2, 4-7 as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- responsibleDateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 3, Date of birth (if SSN or other TIN is not available)
- originOfHealthCoverageCode (`String`): Box 8, Enter letter identifying Origin of the Health Coverage
- employer (`Tax Party 3`): Boxes 10-15, Employer EIN, name and address
- coveredIndividuals (`array<Health Insurance Covered Individual>`): Boxes 23+, Covered Individuals


## Form 1095-C

- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
