- nonEmployeeCompensation (`Decimal`): Box 1, Nonemployee compensation
- payerDirectSales (`Boolean`): Box 2, Payer made direct sales of $5,000 or more of consumer products to a buyer (recipient) for resale
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 5-7, State and Local tax withholding


## Form 1099-OID
Original Issue Discount, from PAYER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to RECIPIENT (3rd-4th boxes)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): FATCA filing requirement
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- originalIssueDiscount (`Decimal`): Box 1, Original issue discount
- otherPeriodicInterest (`Decimal`): Box 2, Other periodic interest
- earlyWithdrawalPenalty (`Decimal`): Box 3, Early withdrawal penalty
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- marketDiscount (`Decimal`): Box 5, Market discount
- acquisitionPremium (`Decimal`): Box 6, Acquisition premium
- oidDescription (`String`): Box 7, Description
- discountOnTreasuryObligations (`Decimal`): Box 8, Original issue discount on U.S. Treasury obligations
- investmentExpenses (`Decimal`): Box 9, Investment expenses
- bondPremium (`Decimal`): Box 10, Bond premium
- taxExemptOid (`Decimal`): Box 11, Tax-exempt OID
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 12-14, State and Local tax withheld
- stateExemptOid (`array<Description and Amount>`): Supplemental: State name and tax-exempt OID by state
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice


## Form 1099-PATR
Taxable Distributions Received From Cooperatives, from PAYER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to RECIPIENT (3rd-4th boxes)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- patronageDividends (`Decimal`): Box 1, Patronage dividends
- nonpatronageDistributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Nonpatronage distributions
- perUnitRetainAllocations (`Decimal`): Box 3, Per-unit retain allocations
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- redemption (`Decimal`): Box 5, Redemption of nonqualified notices and retain allocations
- section199Deduction (`Decimal`): Box 6, Section 199A(g) deduction
- qualifiedPayments (`Decimal`): Box 7, Qualified payments
- section199QualifiedItems (`Decimal`): Box 8, Section 199A(a) qualified items
- section199SstbItems (`Decimal`): Box 9, Section 199A(a) SSTB (Specified Service Trade or Business) items
- investmentCredit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Investment credit
- workOpportunityCredit (`Decimal`): Box 11, Work opportunity credit
- otherCreditsAndDeductions (`Decimal`): Box 12, Other credits and deductions
- specifiedCoop (`Boolean`): Box 13, Specified Cooperative
- stateAndLocal (`State and Local Tax Withholding 2`): State and Local tax withholding, from IRS's IRIS schema
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice


## Form 1099-Q
Payments From Qualified Education Programs, from PAYER/TRUSTEE (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to RECIPIENT (3rd-4th boxes)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- earnings (`Decimal`): Box 2, Earnings
- basis (`Decimal`): Box 3, Basis
- trusteeToTrustee (`Boolean`): Box 4, Trustee-to-trustee transfer
- tuitionPlanPrivate (`Boolean`): Box 5a, Qualified tuition plan - Private
- tuitionPlanPublic (`Boolean`): Box 5b, Qualified tuition plan - Public
- coverdellEsa (`Boolean`): Box 5c, Coverdell ESA
- recipientIsNotBeneficiary (`Boolean`): Box 6, If this box is checked, the recipient is not the designated beneficiary
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): If fair market value (FMV) is included, see Pub. 970, Tax Benefits for Education, for how to figure earnings


## Form 1099-QA
Distributions From ABLE Accounts, from PAYER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to RECIPIENT (3rd-4th boxes)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- earnings (`Decimal`): Box 2, Earnings
- basis (`Decimal`): Box 3, Basis
- programTransfer (`Boolean`): Box 4, Program-to-program transfer
- terminated (`Boolean`): Box 5, Check if ABLE account terminated in current year
- notBeneficiary (`Boolean`): Box 6, Check if the recipient is not the designated beneficiary


## Form 1099-R
Distributions from Pensions, Annuities, Retirement or Profit-Sharing Plans, IRAs, Insurance Contracts, etc., from PAYER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to RECIPIENT (3rd-4th boxes)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- allocableToIRR (`Decimal`): Box 10, Amount allocable to IRR within 5 years
- firstYearOfRoth (`Number`): Box 11, First year of designated Roth contributions. A four-digit year. (Like `TaxYear` definition, but lower minimum since first year of Roth IRAs was 1997)
- recipientAccountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- taxableAmount (`Decimal`): Box 2a, Taxable amount
- taxableAmountNotDetermined (`Boolean`): Box 2b, Taxable amount not determined
- totalDistribution (`Boolean`): Box 2c, Total distribution
- capitalGain (`Decimal`): Box 3, Capital gain
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- employeeContributions (`Decimal`): Box 5, Employee contributions
- netUnrealizedAppreciation (`Decimal`): Box 6, Net unrealized appreciation
- distributionCodes (`array<String>`): Box 7, Distribution codes
- iraSepSimple (`Boolean`): Box 7b, IRA/SEP/SIMPLE
- otherAmount (`Decimal`): Box 8, Other
- otherPercent (`Decimal`): Box 8, Other percent
- yourPercentOfTotal (`Decimal`): Box 9a, Your percent of total distribution
- totalEmployeeContributions (`Decimal`): Box 9b, Total employee contributions
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): Box 12, FATCA filing requirement
- dateOfPayment (`Date`): Box 13, Date of payment
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 14-19, State and Local tax withholding


## Form 1099-S
Proceeds From Real Estate Transactions, from FILER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to TRANSFEROR (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account or escrow number
- dateOfClosing (`Date`): Box 1, Date of closing
- grossProceeds (`Decimal`): Box 2, Gross proceeds
- addressOrLegalDescription (`String`): Box 3, Address or legal description
- receivedOtherConsideration (`Boolean`): Box 4, Transferor received or will receive property or services as part of the consideration (if checked)
- foreignPerson (`Boolean`): Box 5, If checked, transferor is a foreign person (nonresident alien, foreign partnership, foreign estate, or foreign trust)
- realEstateTax (`Decimal`): Box 6, Buyer's part of real estate tax


## Form 1099-SA
Distributions From an HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage MSA, from PAYER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to RECIPIENT (3rd-4th boxes)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- earnings (`Decimal`): Box 2, Earnings on excess contributions
- distributionCode (`String`): Box 3, Distribution code
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, FMV on date of death
- hsa (`Boolean`): Box 5a, HSA
- archerAccount (`Boolean`): Box 5b, Archer MSA
- medicalSavingsAccount (`Boolean`): Box 5c, Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA


## Form 1099-SB
Seller's Investment in Life Insurance Contract, from ISSUER (1st-2nd boxes) to SELLER (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- policyNumber (`String`): Policy number
- contractInvestment (`Decimal`): Box 1, Investment in contract
- surrenderAmount (`Decimal`): Box 2, Surrender amount
- contactNameAddress (`Name Address and Phone 2`): Issuer's information contact name, street address, city or town, state or province, country, ZIP or foreign postal code, and telephone no. (if different from ISSUER)


## Form 1120-S K-1
Shareholder's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc., from Corporation (boxes A-B as issuer) to Shareholder (boxes E-F as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- finalK1 (`Boolean`): Final K-1
- amendedK1 (`Boolean`): Amended K-1
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end date
- irsCenter (`String`): Box C, IRS Center where corporation filed return
- corporationBeginningShares (`Decimal`): Box D, Corporation's total number of shares, Beginning of tax year
- corporationEndingShares (`Decimal`): Box D, Corporation's total number of shares, End of tax year
- percentOwnership (`Decimal`): Box G, Current year allocation percentage
- beginningShares (`Decimal`): Box H, Shareholder's number of shares, Beginning of tax year
- endingShares (`Decimal`): Box H, Shareholder's number of shares, End of tax year
- beginningLoans (`Decimal`): Box I, Loans from shareholder, Beginning of tax year
- endingLoans (`Decimal`): Box I, Loans from shareholder, Ending of tax year
- ordinaryIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Ordinary business income (loss)
- netRentalRealEstateIncome (`Decimal`): Box 2, Net rental real estate income (loss)
- otherRentalIncome (`Decimal`): Box 3, Other net rental income (loss)
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 4, Interest income
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 5a, Ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 5b, Qualified dividends
- royalties (`Decimal`): Box 6, Royalties
- netShortTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 7, Net short-term capital gain (loss)
- netLongTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 8a, Net long-term capital gain (loss)
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 8b, Collectibles (28%) gain (loss)
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 8c, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- net1231Gain (`Decimal`): Box 9, Net section 1231 gain (loss)
- otherIncome (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 10, Other income (loss)
- section179Deduction (`Decimal`): Box 11, Section 179 deduction
- otherDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Other deductions
- credits (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 13, Credits
- scheduleK3 (`Boolean`): Box 14, Schedule K-3 is attached
- amtItems (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 15, Alternative minimum tax (AMT) items
- basisItems (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 16, Items affecting shareholder basis
- otherInfo (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 17, Other information
- multipleAtRiskActivities (`Boolean`): Box 18, More than one activity for at-risk purposes
- multiplePassiveActivities (`Boolean`): Box 19, More than one activity for passive activity purposes


## Form 2439
Notice to Shareholder of Undistributed Long-Term Capital Gains, from RIC or REIT (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to Shareholder (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end date
- undistributedLongTermCapitalGains (`Decimal`): Box 1a, Total undistributed long-term capital gains
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 1b, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- section1202Gain (`Decimal`): Box 1c, Section 1202 gain
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 1d, Collectibles (28%) gain
- taxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 2, Tax paid by the RIC or REIT on the box 1a gains


## Form 3921
Exercise of an Incentive Stock Option Under Section 422(b), from TRANSFEROR (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to EMPLOYEE (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- optionGrantDate (`Date`): Box 1, Date option granted
- optionExerciseDate (`Date`): Box 2, Date option exercised
- exercisePrice (`Decimal`): Box 3, Exercise price per share
- exerciseMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, Fair market value per share on exercise date
- numberOfShares (`Decimal`): Box 5, Number of shares transferred
- corporation (`Tax Party 4`): Box 6, If other than TRANSFEROR, name, address and tin of corporation whose stock is being transferred


## Form 3922
Transfer of Stock Acquired Through an Employee Stock Purchase Plan under Section 423(c), from CORPORATION (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to EMPLOYEE (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- optionGrantDate (`Date`): Box 1, Date option granted
- optionExerciseDate (`Date`): Box 2, Date option exercised
- grantMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 3, Fair market value per share on grant date
- exerciseMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, Fair market value per share on exercise date
- exercisePrice (`Decimal`): Box 5, Exercise price paid per share
- numberOfShares (`Decimal`): Box 6, Number of shares transferred
- titleTransferDate (`Date`): Box 7, Date legal title transferred
- grantDateExercisePrice (`Decimal`): Box 8, Exercise price per share determined as if the option was exercised on the option granted date


## Form 5498
IRA Contribution Information, from TRUSTEE/ISSUER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to PARTICIPANT (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- iraContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, IRA contributions
- rolloverContributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Rollover contributions
- rothIraConversion (`Decimal`): Box 3, Roth IRA conversion amount
- recharacterizedContributions (`Decimal`): Box 4, Recharacterized contributions
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 5, Fair market value of account
- lifeInsuranceCost (`Decimal`): Box 6, Life insurance cost included in box 1
- ira (`Boolean`): Box 7a, IRA
- sep (`Boolean`): Box 7b, SEP
- simple (`Boolean`): Box 7c, SIMPLE
- rothIra (`Boolean`): Box 7d, Roth IRA
- sepContributions (`Decimal`): Box 8, SEP contributions
- simpleContributions (`Decimal`): Box 9, SIMPLE contributions
- rothIraContributions (`Decimal`): Box 10, Roth IRA contributions
- rmdNextYear (`Boolean`): Box 11, If checked, required minimum distribution for next year
- rmdDate (`Date`): Box 12a, RMD date
- rmdAmount (`Decimal`): Box 12b, RMD amount
- postponedContribution (`Decimal`): Box 13a, Postponed contribution
- postponedYear (`Number`): Box 13b, Year
- postponedCode (`String`): Box 13c, Code
- repayments (`Decimal`): Box 14a, Repayments
- repayCode (`String`): Box 14b, Code
- fmvSpecifiedAssets (`Decimal`): Box 15a, FMV of certain specified assets
- specifiedCodes (`String`): Box 15b, Code(s)


## Form 5498-ESA
Coverdell ESA Contribution Information, from TRUSTEE/ISSUER (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to BENEFICIARY (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- coverdellEsaContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, Coverdell ESA contributions
- rolloverContributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Rollover contributions


## Form 5498-QA
ABLE Account Contribution Information, from ISSUER (1st-2nd boxes) to BENEFICIARY (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- ableContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, ABLE contributions
- rollovers (`Decimal`): Box 2, ABLE to ABLE Rollovers
- cumulativeContributions (`Decimal`): Box 3, Cumulative contributions
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, Fair market value
- openedInTaxYear (`Boolean`): Box 5, Check if account opened in current tax year
- basisOfDisabilityCode (`String`): Box 6, Basis of eligibility
- typeOfDisabilityCode (`String`): Box 7, Code


## Form 5498-SA
HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA Information, from TRUSTEE (1st-2nd boxes as issuer) to PARTICIPANT (3rd-4th boxes as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- msaContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, Employee or self-employed person's Archer MSA contributions made in current and following years for current year
- totalContributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Total contributions made in current year
- totalPostYearEnd (`Decimal`): Box 3, Total HSA or Archer MSA contributions made in following year for current year
- rolloverContributions (`Decimal`): Box 4, Rollover contributions
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 5, Fair market value of HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA
- hsa (`Boolean`): Box 6a, HSA
- archer (`Boolean`): Box 6b, Archer MSA
- maMsa (`Boolean`): Box 6c, Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA


## Tax Form Attribute
An additional tax form attribute for use when a defined field is not available

### Properties
- name (`String`): Name of attribute
- value (`String`): Value of attribute
- boxNumber (`String`): Box number on a tax form, if any
- code (`String`): Tax form code for the given box number, if any


## Tax Party
Legal entity for issuer or recipient, used across all tax forms

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party Type
Whether the tax legal entity is a business or an individual

### Properties
- BUSINESS
- INDIVIDUAL


## Tax Refund Direct Deposit
IRS Form 8888 Direct Deposit Information

### Properties
- institutionName (`String`): Name of institution
- rtn (`String`): Routing transit number
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- accountNickName (`String`): Account nickname


## Tax Statement
Tax statement containing one or more tax forms

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- taxStatementId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for the tax statement. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the id on the enclosed tax form(s), or this may be a different id
- issuer (`Tax Party 6`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms
- recipient (`Tax Party 7`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms
- taxDataType (`Type Data Type 1`): Whether this `application/json` tax form response contains data in `forms` property (as 'JSON' format) or `pdf` property (as 'BASE64_PDF' format)
- forms (`array<Tax Data>`): The list of data contents for all included tax forms, response should include one of `forms` or `pdf`
- pdf (`Binary`): PDF version of the tax statement containing all form pages, binary encoded as Base64, response should include one of `pdf` or `forms`
- attributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Additional tax statement attributes that the provider wishes to include


## Tax Statement List
Tax statement list containing one or more tax statements

### Properties
- statements (`array<Tax Statement>`): The list of tax statements


## Form W-2
Wage and Tax Statement, from Employer (boxes b-c as issuer) to Employee (boxes a, e-f as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- controlNumber (`String`): Control number
- wages (`Decimal`): Box 1, Wages, tips, other compensation
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 2, Federal income tax withheld
- socialSecurityWages (`Decimal`): Box 3, Social security wages
- socialSecurityTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Social security tax withheld
- medicareWages (`Decimal`): Box 5, Medicare wages and tips
- medicareTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 6, Medicare tax withheld
- socialSecurityTips (`Decimal`): Box 7, Social security tips
- allocatedTips (`Decimal`): Box 8, Allocated tips
- dependentCareBenefit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Dependent care benefits
- nonQualifiedPlan (`Decimal`): Box 11, Nonqualified plans
- codes (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Codes and amounts
- statutory (`Boolean`): Box 13, Statutory employee
- retirementPlan (`Boolean`): Box 13, Retirement plan
- thirdPartySickPay (`Boolean`): Box 13, Third-party sick pay
- esppQualified (`Decimal`): Employee Stock Purchase Plan Qualified Disposition amount
- esppNonQualified (`Decimal`): Employee Stock Purchase Plan Nonqualified Disposition amount
- other (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 14, Other descriptions and amounts
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 15-20, State and Local tax withholding


## Form W-2c
IRS form W-2c, Corrected Wage and Tax Statement, from Employer (boxes a-b as issuer) to Employee (boxes d, h-i as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- correctedTinOrName (`Boolean`): Box e, Corrected SSN and/or name
- previousEmployeeTin (`String`): Box f, Employee's previously reported SSN
- previousEmployeeName (`Individual Name 3`): Box g, Employee's previously reported name
- originalW2 (`Form W-21`): Boxes 1-20 of Previously reported Wage and Tax Statement
- correctedW2 (`Form W-22`): Boxes 1-20 of Correct information Wage and Tax Statement


## Form W-2G
Certain Gambling Winnings, from PAYER (1st-3rd boxes as issuer) to WINNER (boxes 4th-6th and 9 as recipient)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- winnings (`Decimal`): Box 1, Reportable winnings
- dateWon (`Date`): Box 2, Date won
- typeOfWager (`String`): Box 3, Type of wager
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- transaction (`String`): Box 5, Transaction
- race (`String`): Box 6, Race
- identicalWinnings (`Decimal`): Box 7, Winnings from identical wagers
- cashier (`String`): Box 8, Cashier
- window (`String`): Box 10, Window
- firstId (`String`): Box 11, First I.D.
- secondId (`String`): Box 12, Second I.D.
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 13-18, State and Local tax withholding, use income fields for state (box 14) and local (box 16) winnings amounts


## Telephone Number
Standard for international phone numbers

### Properties
- type (`Telephone Number Type 2`): Type of phone number: HOME, BUSINESS, CELL, FAX
- country (`String`): Country calling codes defined by ITU-T recommendations E.123 and E.164
- number (`String`): Telephone subscriber number defined by ITU-T recommendation E.164


## Telephone Number Plus Extension
A telephone number that can contain optional text for an arbitrary length telephone extension number

### Properties
- type (`Telephone Number Type 2`): Type of phone number: HOME, BUSINESS, CELL, FAX
- country (`String`): Country calling codes defined by ITU-T recommendations E.123 and E.164
- number (`String`): Telephone subscriber number defined by ITU-T recommendation E.164
- extension (`String`): An arbitrary length telephone number extension


## Telephone Number Type
Purpose or type of telephone number

### Properties
- BUSINESS
- CELL
- FAX
- HOME


## Vesting Entity
Provides the past, present, and future vesting schedule and percentages.

### Properties
- vestingDate (`DateTime`): Vesting date
- symbol (`String`): Security symbol
- strikePrice (`Decimal`): Strike price
- vestingPercentage (`Decimal`): Vesting percentage
- otherVestAmount (`Decimal`): Other vest amount
- otherVestPercentage (`Decimal`): Other vest percentage
- vestedBalance (`Decimal`): Vested balance
- unVestedBalance (`Decimal`): Unvested balance
- vestedQuantity (`Decimal`): Vested qualtity
- unVestedQuantity (`Decimal`): Unvested quantity


## Account Contact entity
Contact information for the account

### Properties
- holders (`array<Account Holder Entity>`): Owners of the account
- emails (`array<String>`): Email addresses associated with the account


## Account Holder entity
Extends `Customer` and adds a `relationship` field to define the customer's relationship with an account

### Properties
- customerId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the end-user. This identity must be unique to the owning institution
- name (`Name`): The end-user's name
- relationship (`Account Holder Relationship 2`): Customer's relationship to the account


## Account Holder Relationship
Types of relationships between accounts and holders. Suggested values

### Properties
- AUTHORIZED_USER
- BUSINESS
- FOR_BENEFIT_OF
- FOR_BENEFIT_OF_PRIMARY
- FOR_BENEFIT_OF_PRIMARY_JOINT_RESTRICTED
- FOR_BENEFIT_OF_SECONDARY
- FOR_BENEFIT_OF_SECONDARY_JOINT_RESTRICTED
- FOR_BENEFIT_OF_SOLE_OWNER_RESTRICTED
- POWER_OF_ATTORNEY
- PRIMARY_JOINT_TENANTS
- PRIMARY
- PRIMARY_BORROWER
- PRIMARY_JOINT
- SECONDARY
- SECONDARY_JOINT_TENANTS
- SECONDARY_BORROWER
- SECONDARY_JOINT
- SOLE_OWNER
- TRUSTEE
- UNIFORM_TRANSFER_TO_MINOR


## Business Customer entity
Customers that are commercial in nature are affiliated with a business entity

### Properties
- name (`String`): Name of business customer
- registeredAgents (`array<Customer Name>`): A list of registered agents who act on behalf of the business customer
- registeredId (`String`): The registered tax identification number (TIN) or other identifier of business customer
- industryCode (`Industry Code`): Industry code and type
- domicile (`Domicile`): The country and region of the business customer's location


## customerName


### Properties
- first (`String`): First or given name. This data element may contain first & last name if not separated.
- middle (`String`)
- last (`String`)
- prefix (`String`): Name prefix, e.g. Mr.
- suffix (`String`): Generational or academic suffix
- company (`String`): Company name

## accountCategory
The account category of the insurance account. Possible enums: DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT, INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT, LOAN_ACCOUNT, LOC_ACCOUNT, INSURANCE_ACCOUNT

### Properties
- DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT
- INVESTMENT_ACCOUNT
- LOAN_ACCOUNT
- LOC_ACCOUNT
- INSURANCE_ACCOUNT


## Action
HTTP Method to use for the request

### Properties
- GET
- POST
- PATCH
- DELETE
- PUT


## Address1
Issuer or recipient address

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code


## address2


### Properties
- type (`Location Type`): The location type of an address
- line1 (`String`): May contain full address if not separated
- line2 (`String`)
- line3 (`String`)
- city (`String`)
- state (`String`)
- postalCode (`String`)
- country (`String`): ISO 3166 Country Code


## Address3
Box 1a, Physical address of property (street, city, state, ZIP code)

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code


## Address5
Box 8, Address of property securing mortgage

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code

## Cryptocurrency Tax Statement list1
Cryptocurrency Tax Statement list

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- gainsAndLosses (`array<Gain or Loss From Cryptocurrency Transaction>`): The list of cryptocurrency gains and losses


## debitCreditMemo
Akoya will ensure that this is correctly populated with one of DEBIT or CREDIT and matches the sign of the status field.

### Properties
- DEBIT
- CREDIT


## DebtClass
Classification of debt

### Properties
- TREASURY
- MUNICIPAL
- CORPORATE
- OTHER


## DebtType
Debt type

### Properties
- ASSET
- COUPON


## deliveryAddress


### Properties
- type (`String`): Type of address location. One of BUSINESS, HOME, MAILING


## domicile
The country and region of the business customer's location

### Properties
- region (`String`)
- country (`String`)


## Error2
Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form

### Properties
- code (`Number`): Error code defined by FDX API Specification or Data Provider indicating the error situation which has occurred
- message (`String`): End user displayable information which might help the customer diagnose an error
- debugMessage (`String`): Message used to debug the root cause of the error. Contents should not be used in consumer's business logic. Can change at any time and should only be used for consumer to communicate with the data provider about an issue. Provider can include an error GUID in message for their use.


## Expired Option Type1
To indicate gain or loss resulted from option expiration. If salesPrice (1d, proceeds) is zero, use PURCHASED. If costBasis (1e) is zero, use GRANTED

### Properties
- GRANTED
- PURCHASED


## FiAssetClass


### Properties
- assetClass (`String`): FI-specific asset class
- percent (`Decimal`): Percentage of asset class that falls under this asset


## Form 1042-S Agent1
Boxes 12a-i, Withholding agent

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity


## Form 1042-S Recipient1
Boxes 13a-j, 13l, Recipient for Form 1042-S

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity
- lobCode (`String`): Box 13j, Recipient's LOB code, if any
- dateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 13l, Recipient's date of birth


## Form 1042-S Agent2
Boxes 14a-b, Primary Withholding Agent

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity


## Form 1042-S2
Foreign Person's U.S. Source Income Subject to Withholding

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- formId (`String`): Unique form identifier
- amended (`Boolean`): Amended
- amendmentNumber (`Number`): Amendment number
- incomeTypeCode (`String`): Box 1, Income code
- grossIncome (`Decimal`): Box 2, Gross income
- chapterIndicator (`String`): Box 3, Chapter indicator
- ch3ExemptionCode (`String`): Box 3a, Exemption code
- ch3TaxRate (`Decimal`): Box 3b, Tax rate
- ch4ExemptionCode (`String`): Box 4a, Exemption code
- ch4TaxRate (`Decimal`): Box 4b, Tax rate
- withholdingAllowance (`Decimal`): Box 5, Withholding allowance
- netIncome (`Decimal`): Box 6, Net income
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 7a, Federal tax withheld
- escrowProceduresApplied (`Boolean`): Box 7b, Check if federal tax withheld was not deposited with the IRS because escrow procedures were applied
- subsequentYear (`Boolean`): Box 7c, Check if withholding occurred in subsequent year with respect to a partnership interest
- otherAgentsTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 8, Tax withheld by other agents
- recipientRepaidAmount (`Decimal`): Box 9, Overwithheld tax repaid to recipient pursuant to adjustment procedures
- totalTaxWithholdingCredit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Total withholding credit
- withholdingAgentTaxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 11, Tax paid by withholding agent (amounts not withheld)
- withholdingAgent (`Form 1042 -S Agent 1`): Boxes 12a-i, Withholding agent
- form1042Recipient (`Form 1042 -S Recipient 1`): Boxes 13a-j, 13l, Recipient for Form 1042-S
- accountNumber (`String`): Box 13k, Recipient account number
- primary (`Form 1042 -S Agent 2`): Boxes 14a-b, Primary Withholding Agent
- prorataBasisReporting (`Boolean`): Box 15, Check if pro-rata basis reporting
- intermediary (`Form 1042 -S Agent 3`): Boxes 15a-i, Intermediary or flow thru entity
- payer (`Form 1042 -S Agent 4`): Boxes 16a-e, Payer
- stateAndLocal (`State and Local Tax Withholding 1`): Box 17, State and Local tax withholding


## Form 1095-A2
Health Insurance Marketplace Statement

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- marketplaceId (`String`): Box 1, Marketplace identifier
- marketplacePolicyNumber (`String`): Box 2, Marketplace-assigned policy number
- policyIssuerName (`String`): Box 3, Policy issuer's name
- recipientDateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 6, Recipient's date of birth
- spouseName (`String`): Box 7, Recipient's spouse's name
- spouseTin (`String`): Box 8, Recipient's spouse's SSN
- spouseDateOfBirth (`Date`): Box 9, Recipient's spouse's date of birth
- policyStartDate (`Date`): Box 10, Policy start date
- policyTerminationDate (`Date`): Box 11, Policy termination date
- coveredIndividuals (`array<Health Insurance Marketplace Covered Individual>`): Boxes 16+, Covered Individuals
- coverages (`array<Health Insurance Coverage>`): Boxes 21-33, Coverage Information

- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"

- asNominee (`Boolean`): Form 1097-BTC issuer is: An entity or a person that received or should have received a current year Form 1097-BTC and is distributing part or all of that credit to others
- total (`Decimal`): Box 1, Total
- bondCode (`String`): Box 2a, Code
- uniqueId (`String`): Box 2b, Unique Identifier
- bondType (`String`): Box 3, Bond type
- amounts (`array<Month and Amount>`): Box 5, Amounts by month

## Form 1098-C2
Contributions of Motor Vehicles, Boats, and Airplanes

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- dateOfContribution (`Date`): Box 1, Date of contribution
- odometerMileage (`Number`): Box 2a, Odometer mileage
- carYear (`Number`): Box 2b, Year
- make (`String`): Box 2c, Make
- model (`String`): Box 2d, Model
- vin (`String`): Box 3, Vehicle or other identification number
- armsLengthTransaction (`Boolean`): Box 4a, Donee certifies that vehicle was sold in arm's length transaction to unrelated party
- dateOfSale (`Date`): Box 4b, Date of sale
- grossProceeds (`Decimal`): Box 4c, Gross proceeds from sale (see instructions)
- notTransferredBefore (`Boolean`): Box 5a, Donee certifies that vehicle will not be transferred for money, other property, or services before completion of material improvements or significant intervening use
- needyIndividual (`Boolean`): Box 5b, Donee certifies that vehicle is to be transferred to a needy individual for significantly below fair market value in furtherance of donee's charitable purpose
- descriptionOfImprovements (`String`): Box 5c, Donee certifies the following detailed description of material improvements or significant intervening use and duration of use
- goodsInExchange (`Boolean`): Box 6a, Did you provide goods or services in exchange for the vehicle? Yes
- valueOfExchange (`Decimal`): Box 6b, Value of goods and services provided in exchange for the vehicle
- intangibleReligious (`Boolean`): Box 6c, If this box is checked, donee certifies that the goods and services consisted solely of intangible religious benefits
- descriptionOfGoods (`String`): Box 6c, Describe the goods and services, if any, that were provided
- maxDeductionApplies (`Boolean`): Box 7, Under the law, the donor may not claim a deduction of more than $500 for this vehicle if this box is checked

- insuranceRefund (`Decimal`): Box 10, Insurance contract reimbursement / refund

- personallyLiable (`Boolean`): Box 5, If checked, the borrower was personally liable for repayment of the debt
