- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

- profitOnClosedContracts (`Decimal`): Box 8, Profit or (loss) realized in current year on closed contracts
- unrealizedProfitOpenContractsBegin (`Decimal`): Box 9, Unrealized profit or loss on open contracts at end of last year
- unrealizedProfitOpenContractsEnd (`Decimal`): Box 10, Unrealized profit or loss on open contracts at end of current year
- aggregateProfitOnContracts (`Decimal`): Box 11, Aggregate profit or (loss) on contracts
- bartering (`Decimal`): Box 13, Bartering
- securityDetails (`array<Security Detail IRS Form 1099 -B>`): Boxes 1-3, 5-7, 12, Security details
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice

- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- dateOfEvent (`Date`): Box 1, Date of identifiable event
- amountDischarged (`Decimal`): Box 2, Amount of debt discharged
- interestIncluded (`Decimal`): Box 3, Interest if included in box 2
- debtDescription (`String`): Box 4, Debt description
- personallyLiable (`Boolean`): Box 5, If checked, the debtor was personally liable for repayment of the debt
- debtCode (`String`): Box 6, Identifiable debt code
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 7, Fair market value of property


## Form 1099-CAP2
Changes in Corporate Control and Capital Structure

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- dateOfSale (`Date`): Box 1, Date of sale or exchange
- aggregateAmount (`Decimal`): Box 2, Aggregate amount received
- numberOfShares (`Decimal`): Box 3, Number of shares exchanged
- stockClasses (`String`): Box 4, Classes of stock exchanged


## Form 1099 Consolidated Statement2
Consolidated Statement for combined IRS Form 1099s

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- marginInterestPaid (`Decimal`): Interest paid on margin account
- paymentInLieuPaid (`Decimal`): Payment in lieu of dividends paid
- advisorFeesPaid (`Decimal`): Advisor fees paid
- otherFeesPaid (`Decimal`): Other fees paid
- corporateBondInterestPaid (`Decimal`): Accrued Interest Paid offset to form 1099-INT box 1, Corporate bond interest income
- usBondInterestPaid (`Decimal`): Accrued Interest Paid offset to form 1099-INT box 3, accrued U.S. Treasury Notes and Bonds interest income
- taxExemptInterestPaid (`Decimal`): Accrued Interest Paid offset to form 1099-INT box 8, tax exempt interest income from municipal bonds
- specifiedPabInterestPaid (`Decimal`): Accrued Interest Paid offset to form 1099-INT box 9, tax exempt interest income from Private Activity Bonds


## Form 1099-DIV2
Dividends and Distributions

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 1a, Total ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 1b, Qualified dividends
- totalCapitalGain (`Decimal`): Box 2a, Total capital gain distributions
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 2b, Unrecaptured Section 1250 gain
- section1202Gain (`Decimal`): Box 2c, Section 1202 gain
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 2d, Collectibles (28%) gain
- section897Dividends (`Decimal`): Box 2e, Section 897 ordinary dividends
- section897CapitalGain (`Decimal`): Box 2f, Section 897 capital gain
- nonTaxableDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 3, Nondividend distributions
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- section199ADividends (`Decimal`): Box 5, Section 199A dividends
- investmentExpenses (`Decimal`): Box 6, Investment expenses
- foreignTaxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 7, Foreign tax paid
- foreignCountry (`String`): Box 8, Foreign country or U.S. possession
- cashLiquidation (`Decimal`): Box 9, Cash liquidation distributions
- nonCashLiquidation (`Decimal`): Box 10, Noncash liquidation distributions
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): Box 11, FATCA filing requirement
- taxExemptInterestDividend (`Decimal`): Box 12, Exempt-interest dividends
- specifiedPabInterestDividend (`Decimal`): Box 13, Specified private activity bond interest dividends
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 14-16, State and Local tax withholding
- foreignIncomes (`array<Description and Amount>`): Foreign income information
- stateTaxExemptIncomes (`array<Description and Amount>`): Tax exempt income state information
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice


## Form 1099-G2
Certain Government Payments

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

(ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.

- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- unemploymentCompensation (`Decimal`): Box 1, Unemployment compensation
- taxRefund (`Decimal`): Box 2, State or local income tax refunds, credits, or offsets
- refundYear (`Number`): Box 3, Box 2 amount is for tax year
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- rtaaPayments (`Decimal`): Box 5, RTAA payments
- grants (`Decimal`): Box 6, Taxable grants
- agriculturePayments (`Decimal`): Box 7, Agriculture payments
- businessIncome (`Boolean`): Box 8, If checked, box 2 is trade or business income
- marketGain (`Decimal`): Box 9, Market gain
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 10-11, State and Local tax withholding
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice

Interest Income

### Properties

- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.

- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): FATCA filing requirement
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- payerRtn (`String`): Payer's RTN
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Interest income
- earlyWithdrawalPenalty (`Decimal`): Box 2, Early withdrawal penalty
- usBondInterest (`Decimal`): Box 3, Interest on U.S. Savings Bonds and Treasury obligations
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- investmentExpenses (`Decimal`): Box 5, Investment expenses
- foreignTaxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 6, Foreign tax paid
- foreignCountry (`String`): Box 7, Foreign country or U.S. possession
- taxExemptInterest (`Decimal`): Box 8, Tax-exempt interest
- specifiedPabInterest (`Decimal`): Box 9, Specified private activity bond interest
- marketDiscount (`Decimal`): Box 10, Market discount
- bondPremium (`Decimal`): Box 11, Bond premium
- usBondPremium (`Decimal`): Box 12, Bond premium on Treasury obligations
- taxExemptBondPremium (`Decimal`): Box 13, Bond premium on tax-exempt bond
- cusipNumber (`String`): Box 14, Tax-exempt bond CUSIP no.
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 15-17, State and Local tax withholding
- foreignIncomes (`array<Description and Amount>`): Supplemental foreign income amount information (description is country)
- stateTaxExemptIncome (`array<Description and Amount>`): Supplemental tax-exempt income by state (description is state)
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice


## Form 1099-K2
Merchant Card and Third-Party Network Payments

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- paymentSettlementEntity (`Boolean`): Check to indicate if FILER is a Payment Settlement Entity (PSE)
- electronicPaymentFacilitator (`Boolean`): Check to indicate if FILER is an Electronic Payment Facilitator (EPF) / Other third party
- paymentCard (`Boolean`): Check to indicate transactions reported are: Payment card
- thirdPartyNetwork (`Boolean`): Check to indicate transactions reported are: Third party network
- pseName (`String`): PSE's name
- psePhone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 2`): PSE's phone number
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossAmount (`Decimal`): Box 1a, Gross amount of payment card/third party network transactions
- cardNotPresent (`Decimal`): Box 1b, Card Not Present Transactions
- merchantCategoryCode (`String`): Box 2, Merchant category code
- numberOfTransactions (`Decimal`): Box 3, Number of purchase transactions
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- monthAmounts (`array<Month and Amount>`): Box 5, Monthly amounts
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 6-8, State and Local tax withholding
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice

- issuerName (`String`): Issuer's name
- contactNameAddress (`Name Address and Phone 1`): Acquirer's information contact name, street address, city or town, state or province, country, ZIP or foreign postal code, and telephone no. (If different from ACQUIRER)

- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.

- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"

- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

- fishingBoatProceeds (`Decimal`): Box 5, Fishing boat proceeds
- medicalHealthPayment (`Decimal`): Box 6, Medical and health care payments
- payerDirectSales (`Boolean`): Box 7, Payer made direct sales of $5,000 or more of consumer products to a buyer (recipient) for resale
- substitutePayments (`Decimal`): Box 8, Substitute payments in lieu of dividends or interest
- cropInsurance (`Decimal`): Box 9, Crop insurance proceeds
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice
- grossAttorney (`Decimal`): Box 10, Gross proceeds paid to an attorney
- fishPurchased (`Decimal`): Box 11, Fish purchased for resale
- section409ADeferrals (`Decimal`): Box 12, Section 409A deferrals
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): Box 13, FATCA filing requirement
- excessGolden (`Decimal`): Box 14, Excess golden parachute payments
- nonQualifiedDeferredCompensation (`Decimal`): Box 15, Nonqualified Deferred Compensation
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 16-18, State and Local tax withholding

## Form 1099-OID2
Original Issue Discount

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): FATCA filing requirement
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- originalIssueDiscount (`Decimal`): Box 1, Original issue discount
- otherPeriodicInterest (`Decimal`): Box 2, Other periodic interest
- earlyWithdrawalPenalty (`Decimal`): Box 3, Early withdrawal penalty
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- marketDiscount (`Decimal`): Box 5, Market discount
- acquisitionPremium (`Decimal`): Box 6, Acquisition premium
- oidDescription (`String`): Box 7, Description
- discountOnTreasuryObligations (`Decimal`): Box 8, Original issue discount on U.S. Treasury obligations
- investmentExpenses (`Decimal`): Box 9, Investment expenses
- bondPremium (`Decimal`): Box 10, Bond premium
- taxExemptOid (`Decimal`): Box 11, Tax-exempt OID
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 12-14, State and Local tax withheld
- stateExemptOid (`array<Description and Amount>`): Supplemental: State name and tax-exempt OID by state
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice


## Form 1099-PATR2
Taxable Distributions Received From Cooperatives

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- patronageDividends (`Decimal`): Box 1, Patronage dividends
- nonpatronageDistributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Nonpatronage distributions
- perUnitRetainAllocations (`Decimal`): Box 3, Per-unit retain allocations
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- redemption (`Decimal`): Box 5, Redemption of nonqualified notices and retain allocations
- section199Deduction (`Decimal`): Box 6, Section 199A(g) deduction
- qualifiedPayments (`Decimal`): Box 7, Qualified payments
- section199QualifiedItems (`Decimal`): Box 8, Section 199A(a) qualified items
- section199SstbItems (`Decimal`): Box 9, Section 199A(a) SSTB (Specified Service Trade or Business) items
- investmentCredit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Investment credit
- workOpportunityCredit (`Decimal`): Box 11, Work opportunity credit
- otherCreditsAndDeductions (`Decimal`): Box 12, Other credits and deductions
- specifiedCoop (`Boolean`): Box 13, Specified Cooperative
- stateAndLocal (`State and Local Tax Withholding 2`): State and Local tax withholding, from IRS's IRIS schema
- secondTinNotice (`Boolean`): Second TIN Notice


## Form 1099-Q2
Payments From Qualified Education Programs

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- earnings (`Decimal`): Box 2, Earnings
- basis (`Decimal`): Box 3, Basis
- trusteeToTrustee (`Boolean`): Box 4, Trustee-to-trustee transfer
- tuitionPlanPrivate (`Boolean`): Box 5a, Qualified tuition plan - Private
- tuitionPlanPublic (`Boolean`): Box 5b, Qualified tuition plan - Public
- coverdellEsa (`Boolean`): Box 5c, Coverdell ESA
- recipientIsNotBeneficiary (`Boolean`): Box 6, If this box is checked, the recipient is not the designated beneficiary
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): If fair market value (FMV) is included, see Pub. 970, Tax Benefits for Education, for how to figure earnings


## Form 1099-QA2
Distributions From ABLE Accounts

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- earnings (`Decimal`): Box 2, Earnings
- basis (`Decimal`): Box 3, Basis
- programTransfer (`Boolean`): Box 4, Program-to-program transfer
- terminated (`Boolean`): Box 5, Check if ABLE account terminated in current year
- notBeneficiary (`Boolean`): Box 6, Check if the recipient is not the designated beneficiary


## Form 1099-R2
Distributions from Pensions, Annuities, Retirement or Profit-Sharing Plans, IRAs, Insurance Contracts, etc.

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- allocableToIRR (`Decimal`): Box 10, Amount allocable to IRR within 5 years
- firstYearOfRoth (`Number`): Box 11, First year of designated Roth contributions. A four-digit year. (Like `TaxYear` definition, but lower minimum since first year of Roth IRAs was 1997)
- recipientAccountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- taxableAmount (`Decimal`): Box 2a, Taxable amount
- taxableAmountNotDetermined (`Boolean`): Box 2b, Taxable amount not determined
- totalDistribution (`Boolean`): Box 2c, Total distribution
- capitalGain (`Decimal`): Box 3, Capital gain
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- employeeContributions (`Decimal`): Box 5, Employee contributions
- netUnrealizedAppreciation (`Decimal`): Box 6, Net unrealized appreciation
- distributionCodes (`array<String>`): Box 7, Distribution codes
- iraSepSimple (`Boolean`): Box 7b, IRA/SEP/SIMPLE
- otherAmount (`Decimal`): Box 8, Other
- otherPercent (`Decimal`): Box 8, Other percent
- yourPercentOfTotal (`Decimal`): Box 9a, Your percent of total distribution
- totalEmployeeContributions (`Decimal`): Box 9b, Total employee contributions
- foreignAccountTaxCompliance (`Boolean`): Box 12, FATCA filing requirement
- dateOfPayment (`Date`): Box 13, Date of payment
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 14-19, State and Local tax withholding


## Form 1099-S2
Proceeds From Real Estate Transactions

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account or escrow number
- dateOfClosing (`Date`): Box 1, Date of closing
- grossProceeds (`Decimal`): Box 2, Gross proceeds
- addressOrLegalDescription (`String`): Box 3, Address or legal description
- receivedOtherConsideration (`Boolean`): Box 4, Transferor received or will receive property or services as part of the consideration (if checked)
- foreignPerson (`Boolean`): Box 5, If checked, transferor is a foreign person (nonresident alien, foreign partnership, foreign estate, or foreign trust)
- realEstateTax (`Decimal`): Box 6, Buyer's part of real estate tax


## Form 1099-SA2
Distributions From an HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage MSA

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- grossDistribution (`Decimal`): Box 1, Gross distribution
- earnings (`Decimal`): Box 2, Earnings on excess contributions
- distributionCode (`String`): Box 3, Distribution code
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, FMV on date of death
- hsa (`Boolean`): Box 5a, HSA
- archerAccount (`Boolean`): Box 5b, Archer MSA
- medicalSavingsAccount (`Boolean`): Box 5c, Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA


## Form 1099-SB2
Seller's Investment in Life Insurance Contract

### Properties

- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

(ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.

- policyNumber (`String`): Policy number
- contractInvestment (`Decimal`): Box 1, Investment in contract
- surrenderAmount (`Decimal`): Box 2, Surrender amount
- contactNameAddress (`Name Address and Phone 2`): Issuer's information contact name, street address, city or town, state or province, country, ZIP or foreign postal code, and telephone no. (if different from ISSUER)


## Form 5498-ESA2
Coverdell ESA Contribution Information

- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"

- rolloverContributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Rollover contributions


## Form 5498-QA2
ABLE Account Contribution Information

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

(ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.

- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- ableContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, ABLE contributions
- rollovers (`Decimal`): Box 2, ABLE to ABLE Rollovers
- cumulativeContributions (`Decimal`): Box 3, Cumulative contributions
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, Fair market value
- openedInTaxYear (`Boolean`): Box 5, Check if account opened in current tax year
- basisOfDisabilityCode (`String`): Box 6, Basis of eligibility
- typeOfDisabilityCode (`String`): Box 7, Code


## Form 5498-SA2
HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage MSA Information

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- msaContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, Employee or self-employed person's Archer MSA contributions made in current and following years for current year
- totalContributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Total contributions made in current year
- totalPostYearEnd (`Decimal`): Box 3, Total HSA or Archer MSA contributions made in following year for current year
- rolloverContributions (`Decimal`): Box 4, Rollover contributions
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 5, Fair market value of HSA, Archer MSA, or Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA
- hsa (`Boolean`): Box 6a, HSA
- archer (`Boolean`): Box 6b, Archer MSA
- maMsa (`Boolean`): Box 6c, Medicare Advantage (MA) MSA


## Form 1042-S Agent3
Boxes 15a-i, Intermediary or flow thru entity

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity


## Form 1042-S Agent4
Boxes 16a-e, Payer

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)
- ch3StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 3 status code,
  * Box 12b, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13f, Recipient,
  * Box 15b, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16d, Payer
- ch4StatusCode (`String`): Ch. 4 status code,
  * Box 12c, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13g, Recipient,
  * Box 15c, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16e, Payer
- giin (`String`): Agent's Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN),
  * Box 12e, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13h, Recipient,
  * Box 15e, Intermediary or flow-through entity,
  * Box 16c, Payer
- foreignTin (`String`): Foreign tax identification number, if any,
  * Box 12g, Withholding Agent,
  * Box 13i, Recipient,
  * Box 15g, Intermediary or flow-through entity


## Form 1041 K-12
Beneficiary's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc.

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- finalK1 (`Boolean`): Final K-1
- amendedK1 (`Boolean`): Amended K-1
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end date
- form1041T (`Boolean`): Box D, Check if Form 1041-T was filed
- date1041T (`Date`): Box D, and enter the date it was filed
- final1041 (`Boolean`): Box E, Check if this is the final Form 1041 for the estate or trust
- domestic (`Boolean`): Box H, Domestic beneficiary
- foreign (`Boolean`): Box H, Foreign beneficiary
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Interest income
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 2a, Ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 2b, Qualified dividends
- netShortTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 3, Net short-term capital gain
- netLongTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 4a, Net long-term capital gain
- gain28Rate (`Decimal`): Box 4b, 28% rate gain
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 4c, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- otherPortfolioIncome (`Decimal`): Box 5, Other portfolio and nonbusiness income
- ordinaryBusinessIncome (`Decimal`): Box 6, Ordinary business income
- netRentalRealEstateIncome (`Decimal`): Box 7, Net rental real estate income
- otherRentalIncome (`Decimal`): Box 8, Other rental income
- directlyApportionedDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 9, Directly apportioned deductions
- estateTaxDeduction (`Decimal`): Box 10, Estate tax deduction
- finalYearDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 11, Final year deductions
- fiduciary (`Tax Party 2`): Box C, Fiduciary's name and address
- amtAdjustments (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Alternative minimum tax adjustment
- credits (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 13, Credits and credit recapture
- otherInfo (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 14, Other information


## Form 1065 K-12
Partner's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc.

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end data
- finalK1 (`Boolean`): Final K-1
- amendedK1 (`Boolean`): Amended K-1
- irsCenter (`String`): Box C, IRS Center where partnership filed return
- publiclyTraded (`Boolean`): Box D, Check if this is a publicly traded partnership (PTP)
- generalPartner (`Boolean`): Box G, General partner or LLC member-manager
- limitedPartner (`Boolean`): Box G, Limited partner or other LLC member
- domestic (`Boolean`): Box H1, Domestic partner
- foreign (`Boolean`): Box H1, Foreign partner
- disregardedEntity (`Boolean`): Box H2, Check if the partner is a disregarded entity (DE), and enter the partner's TIN and Name
- disregardedEntityTin (`String`): Box H2, Disregarded entity partner's TIN
- disregardedEntityName (`String`): Box H2, Disregarded entity partner's Name
- entityType (`String`): Box I1, What type of entity is this partner?
- retirementPlan (`Boolean`): Box I2, If this partner is a retirement plan (IRA/SEP/Keogh/etc.), check here
- profitShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of profit - beginning
- profitShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of profit - ending
- lossShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of loss - beginning
- lossShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of loss - ending
- capitalShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of capital - beginning
- capitalShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box J, Partner's share of capital - ending
- decreaseDueToSaleOrExchange (`Boolean`): Box J, Check if decrease is due to sale or exchange of partnership interest. Deprecated and no longer used beginning tax year 2023. Use `decreaseDueToSale` and `decreaseDueToExchange` instead
- decreaseDueToSale (`Boolean`): Box J, Check if decrease is due to sale of partnership interest
- decreaseDueToExchange (`Boolean`): Box J, Check if decrease is due to exchange of partnership interest
- nonrecourseLiabilityShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - beginning - nonrecourse
- nonrecourseLiabilityShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - ending - nonrecourse
- qualifiedLiabilityShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - beginning - qualified nonrecourse financing
- qualifiedLiabilityShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - ending - qualified nonrecourse financing
- recourseLiabilityShareBegin (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - beginning - recourse
- recourseLiabilityShareEnd (`Decimal`): Box K1, Partner's share of liabilities - ending - recourse
- includesLowerTierLiability (`Boolean`): Box K2, Check this box if item K1 includes liability amounts from lower tier partnerships
- liabilitySubjectToGuarantees (`Boolean`): Box K3, Check if any of the above liability is subject to guarantees or other payment obligations by the partner
- capitalAccountBegin (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Beginning capital account
- capitalAccountContributions (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Capital contributed during the year
- capitalAccountIncrease (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Current year net income (loss)
- capitalAccountOther (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Other increase (decrease)
- capitalAccountWithdrawals (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Withdrawals & distributions
- capitalAccountEnd (`Decimal`): Box L, Partner's capital account analysis - Ending capital account
- builtInGain (`Boolean`): Box M, Did the partner contribute property with a built-in gain or loss? - Yes
- unrecognizedSection704Begin (`Decimal`): Box N, Partner's Share of Net Unrecognized Section 704(c) Gain or (Loss) - beginning
- unrecognizedSection704End (`Decimal`): Box N, Partner's Share of Net Unrecognized Section 704(c) Gain or (Loss) - ending
- ordinaryIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Ordinary business income (loss)
- netRentalRealEstateIncome (`Decimal`): Box 2, Net rental real estate income (loss)
- otherRentalIncome (`Decimal`): Box 3, Other net rental income (loss)
- guaranteedPaymentServices (`Decimal`): Box 4a, Guaranteed payments for services
- guaranteedPaymentCapital (`Decimal`): Box 4b, Guaranteed payments for capital
- guaranteedPayment (`Decimal`): Box 4c, Total guaranteed payments
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 5, Interest income
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 6a, Ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 6b, Qualified dividends
- dividendEquivalents (`Decimal`): Box 6c, Dividend equivalents
- royalties (`Decimal`): Box 7, Royalties
- netShortTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 8, Net short-term capital gain (loss)
- netLongTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 9a, Net long-term capital gain (loss)
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 9b, Collectibles (28%) gain (loss)
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 9c, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- net1231Gain (`Decimal`): Box 10, Net section 1231 gain (loss)
- otherIncome (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 11, Other income
- section179Deduction (`Decimal`): Box 12, Section 179 deduction
- otherDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 13, Other deductions
- selfEmployment (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 14, Self-employment earnings (loss)
- credits (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 15, Credits
- scheduleK3 (`Boolean`): Box 16, Schedule K-3 is attached
- amtItems (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 17, Alternative minimum tax (AMT) items
- taxExemptIncome (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 18, Tax-exempt income and nondeductible expenses
- distributions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 19, Distributions
- otherInfo (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 20, Other information
- foreignTaxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 21, Foreign taxes paid or accrued
- multipleAtRiskActivities (`Boolean`): Box 22, More than one activity for at-risk purposes
- multiplePassiveActivities (`Boolean`): Box 23, More than one activity for passive activity purposes


## Form 1120-S K-12
Shareholder's Share of Income, Deductions, Credits, etc.

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- finalK1 (`Boolean`): Final K-1
- amendedK1 (`Boolean`): Amended K-1
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end date
- irsCenter (`String`): Box C, IRS Center where corporation filed return
- corporationBeginningShares (`Decimal`): Box D, Corporation's total number of shares, Beginning of tax year
- corporationEndingShares (`Decimal`): Box D, Corporation's total number of shares, End of tax year
- percentOwnership (`Decimal`): Box G, Current year allocation percentage
- beginningShares (`Decimal`): Box H, Shareholder's number of shares, Beginning of tax year
- endingShares (`Decimal`): Box H, Shareholder's number of shares, End of tax year
- beginningLoans (`Decimal`): Box I, Loans from shareholder, Beginning of tax year
- endingLoans (`Decimal`): Box I, Loans from shareholder, Ending of tax year
- ordinaryIncome (`Decimal`): Box 1, Ordinary business income (loss)
- netRentalRealEstateIncome (`Decimal`): Box 2, Net rental real estate income (loss)
- otherRentalIncome (`Decimal`): Box 3, Other net rental income (loss)
- interestIncome (`Decimal`): Box 4, Interest income
- ordinaryDividends (`Decimal`): Box 5a, Ordinary dividends
- qualifiedDividends (`Decimal`): Box 5b, Qualified dividends
- royalties (`Decimal`): Box 6, Royalties
- netShortTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 7, Net short-term capital gain (loss)
- netLongTermGain (`Decimal`): Box 8a, Net long-term capital gain (loss)
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 8b, Collectibles (28%) gain (loss)
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 8c, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- net1231Gain (`Decimal`): Box 9, Net section 1231 gain (loss)
- otherIncome (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 10, Other income (loss)
- section179Deduction (`Decimal`): Box 11, Section 179 deduction
- otherDeductions (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Other deductions
- credits (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 13, Credits
- scheduleK3 (`Boolean`): Box 14, Schedule K-3 is attached
- amtItems (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 15, Alternative minimum tax (AMT) items
- basisItems (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 16, Items affecting shareholder basis
- otherInfo (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 17, Other information
- multipleAtRiskActivities (`Boolean`): Box 18, More than one activity for at-risk purposes
- multiplePassiveActivities (`Boolean`): Box 19, More than one activity for passive activity purposes


## Form 10982
Mortgage Interest Statement

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- mortgagedProperties (`Number`): Box 9, Number of properties securing the mortgage
- otherInformation (`String`): Box 10, Other (property tax)
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- mortgageInterest (`Decimal`): Box 1, Mortgage interest received from borrower
- outstandingPrincipal (`Decimal`): Box 2, Outstanding mortgage principal
- originationDate (`Date`): Box 3, Mortgage origination date
- overpaidRefund (`Decimal`): Box 4, Refund of overpaid interest
- mortgageInsurance (`Decimal`): Box 5, Mortgage insurance premiums
- pointsPaid (`Decimal`): Box 6, Points paid on purchase of principal residence
- isPropertyAddressSameAsBorrowerAddress (`Boolean`): Box 7, Is address of property securing mortgage same as PAYER'S/BORROWER'S address
- acquisitionDate (`Date`): Box 11, Mortgage acquisition date
- propertyAddress (`Address 5`): Box 8, Address of property securing mortgage
- propertyTax (`Decimal`): Box 10, Property tax
- propertyDescription (`String`): Box 8, Description of property securing mortgage, if property securing mortgage has no address


## Form 24392
Notice to Shareholder of Undistributed Long-Term Capital Gains

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

(ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
