- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- fiscalYearBegin (`Date`): Fiscal year begin date
- fiscalYearEnd (`Date`): Fiscal year end date
- undistributedLongTermCapitalGains (`Decimal`): Box 1a, Total undistributed long-term capital gains
- unrecaptured1250Gain (`Decimal`): Box 1b, Unrecaptured section 1250 gain
- section1202Gain (`Decimal`): Box 1c, Section 1202 gain
- collectiblesGain (`Decimal`): Box 1d, Collectibles (28%) gain
- taxPaid (`Decimal`): Box 2, Tax paid by the RIC or REIT on the box 1a gains


## Form 39212
Exercise of an Incentive Stock Option Under Section 422(b)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- optionGrantDate (`Date`): Box 1, Date option granted
- optionExerciseDate (`Date`): Box 2, Date option exercised
- exercisePrice (`Decimal`): Box 3, Exercise price per share
- exerciseMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, Fair market value per share on exercise date
- numberOfShares (`Decimal`): Box 5, Number of shares transferred
- corporation (`Tax Party 4`): Box 6, If other than TRANSFEROR, name, address and tin of corporation whose stock is being transferred


## Form 39222
Transfer of Stock Acquired Through an Employee Stock Purchase Plan under Section 423(c)

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- optionGrantDate (`Date`): Box 1, Date option granted
- optionExerciseDate (`Date`): Box 2, Date option exercised
- grantMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 3, Fair market value per share on grant date
- exerciseMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 4, Fair market value per share on exercise date
- exercisePrice (`Decimal`): Box 5, Exercise price paid per share
- numberOfShares (`Decimal`): Box 6, Number of shares transferred
- titleTransferDate (`Date`): Box 7, Date legal title transferred
- grantDateExercisePrice (`Decimal`): Box 8, Exercise price per share determined as if the option was exercised on the option granted date


## Form 54982
IRA Contribution Information

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- iraContributions (`Decimal`): Box 1, IRA contributions
- rolloverContributions (`Decimal`): Box 2, Rollover contributions
- rothIraConversion (`Decimal`): Box 3, Roth IRA conversion amount
- recharacterizedContributions (`Decimal`): Box 4, Recharacterized contributions
- fairMarketValue (`Decimal`): Box 5, Fair market value of account
- lifeInsuranceCost (`Decimal`): Box 6, Life insurance cost included in box 1
- ira (`Boolean`): Box 7a, IRA
- sep (`Boolean`): Box 7b, SEP
- simple (`Boolean`): Box 7c, SIMPLE
- rothIra (`Boolean`): Box 7d, Roth IRA
- sepContributions (`Decimal`): Box 8, SEP contributions
- simpleContributions (`Decimal`): Box 9, SIMPLE contributions
- rothIraContributions (`Decimal`): Box 10, Roth IRA contributions
- rmdNextYear (`Boolean`): Box 11, If checked, required minimum distribution for next year
- rmdDate (`Date`): Box 12a, RMD date
- rmdAmount (`Decimal`): Box 12b, RMD amount
- postponedContribution (`Decimal`): Box 13a, Postponed contribution
- postponedYear (`Number`): Box 13b, Year
- postponedCode (`String`): Box 13c, Code
- repayments (`Decimal`): Box 14a, Repayments
- repayCode (`String`): Box 14b, Code
- fmvSpecifiedAssets (`Decimal`): Box 15a, FMV of certain specified assets
- specifiedCodes (`String`): Box 15b, Code(s)


## Form W-2c2
IRS form W-2c, Corrected Wage and Tax Statement

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- correctedTinOrName (`Boolean`): Box e, Corrected SSN and/or name
- previousEmployeeTin (`String`): Box f, Employee's previously reported SSN
- previousEmployeeName (`Individual Name 3`): Box g, Employee's previously reported name
- originalW2 (`Form W-21`): Boxes 1-20 of Previously reported Wage and Tax Statement
- correctedW2 (`Form W-22`): Boxes 1-20 of Correct information Wage and Tax Statement


## Form W-2G2
Certain Gambling Winnings

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- winnings (`Decimal`): Box 1, Reportable winnings
- dateWon (`Date`): Box 2, Date won
- typeOfWager (`String`): Box 3, Type of wager
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Federal income tax withheld
- transaction (`String`): Box 5, Transaction
- race (`String`): Box 6, Race
- identicalWinnings (`Decimal`): Box 7, Winnings from identical wagers
- cashier (`String`): Box 8, Cashier
- window (`String`): Box 10, Window
- firstId (`String`): Box 11, First I.D.
- secondId (`String`): Box 12, Second I.D.
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 13-18, State and Local tax withholding, use income fields for state (box 14) and local (box 16) winnings amounts


## Form W-21
Boxes 1-20 of Previously reported Wage and Tax Statement

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- controlNumber (`String`): Control number
- wages (`Decimal`): Box 1, Wages, tips, other compensation
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 2, Federal income tax withheld
- socialSecurityWages (`Decimal`): Box 3, Social security wages
- socialSecurityTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Social security tax withheld
- medicareWages (`Decimal`): Box 5, Medicare wages and tips
- medicareTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 6, Medicare tax withheld
- socialSecurityTips (`Decimal`): Box 7, Social security tips
- allocatedTips (`Decimal`): Box 8, Allocated tips
- dependentCareBenefit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Dependent care benefits
- nonQualifiedPlan (`Decimal`): Box 11, Nonqualified plans
- codes (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Codes and amounts
- statutory (`Boolean`): Box 13, Statutory employee
- retirementPlan (`Boolean`): Box 13, Retirement plan
- thirdPartySickPay (`Boolean`): Box 13, Third-party sick pay
- esppQualified (`Decimal`): Employee Stock Purchase Plan Qualified Disposition amount
- esppNonQualified (`Decimal`): Employee Stock Purchase Plan Nonqualified Disposition amount
- other (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 14, Other descriptions and amounts
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 15-20, State and Local tax withholding


## Form W-22
Boxes 1-20 of Correct information Wage and Tax Statement

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- controlNumber (`String`): Control number
- wages (`Decimal`): Box 1, Wages, tips, other compensation
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 2, Federal income tax withheld
- socialSecurityWages (`Decimal`): Box 3, Social security wages
- socialSecurityTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Social security tax withheld
- medicareWages (`Decimal`): Box 5, Medicare wages and tips
- medicareTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 6, Medicare tax withheld
- socialSecurityTips (`Decimal`): Box 7, Social security tips
- allocatedTips (`Decimal`): Box 8, Allocated tips

- thirdPartySickPay (`Boolean`): Box 13, Third-party sick pay

## Form W-24
Wage and Tax Statement

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- corrected (`Boolean`): True to indicate this is a corrected tax form
- accountId (`String`): Long-term persistent identity of the source account. Not the account number
- taxFormId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for this tax form. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the enclosing tax statement id, or this may be a different id, or this id may be omitted.
- taxFormDate (`Date`): Date of production or delivery of the tax form
- additionalInformation (`String`): Additional explanation text or content about this tax form
- taxFormType (`Type Form Type 2`): Enumerated name of the tax form entity e.g. "TaxW2"
- issuer (`Tax Party 8`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- recipient (`Tax Party 1`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.
- attributes (`array<Tax Form Attribute>`): Additional attributes for this tax form when defined fields are not available. Some specific additional attributes already defined by providers: Fields required by [IRS FIRE](https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/filing-information-returns-electronically-fire): Name Control, Type of Identification Number (EIN, SSN, ITIN, ATIN). (ATIN is tax ID number for pending adoptions.) Tax form provider field for taxpayer notification: Recipient Email Address.
- error (`Error 2`): Present if an error was encountered while retrieving this form
- links (`array<HATEOAS Link>`): Links to retrieve this form as data or image, or to invoke other APIs
- controlNumber (`String`): Control number
- wages (`Decimal`): Box 1, Wages, tips, other compensation
- federalTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 2, Federal income tax withheld
- socialSecurityWages (`Decimal`): Box 3, Social security wages
- socialSecurityTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 4, Social security tax withheld
- medicareWages (`Decimal`): Box 5, Medicare wages and tips
- medicareTaxWithheld (`Decimal`): Box 6, Medicare tax withheld
- socialSecurityTips (`Decimal`): Box 7, Social security tips
- allocatedTips (`Decimal`): Box 8, Allocated tips
- dependentCareBenefit (`Decimal`): Box 10, Dependent care benefits
- nonQualifiedPlan (`Decimal`): Box 11, Nonqualified plans
- codes (`array<Code and Amount>`): Box 12, Codes and amounts
- statutory (`Boolean`): Box 13, Statutory employee
- retirementPlan (`Boolean`): Box 13, Retirement plan
- thirdPartySickPay (`Boolean`): Box 13, Third-party sick pay
- esppQualified (`Decimal`): Employee Stock Purchase Plan Qualified Disposition amount
- esppNonQualified (`Decimal`): Employee Stock Purchase Plan Nonqualified Disposition amount
- other (`array<Description and Amount>`): Box 14, Other descriptions and amounts
- stateAndLocal (`array<State and Local Tax Withholding>`): Boxes 15-20, State and Local tax withholding

## name
The end-user's name

### Properties
- first (`String`): First or given name. This data element may contain first & last name if not separated.
- middle (`String`)
- last (`String`)
- prefix (`String`): Name prefix, e.g. Mr.
- suffix (`String`): Generational or academic suffix
- company (`String`): Company name
- addresses (`array<Address 2>`): An array of the end-user's physical mail addresses
- telephones (`array<Telephone>`)
- email (`array<String>`): An array of the end-user's electronic mail addresses
- accounts (`array<Account 7>`): List of accounts related to this end-user


## Name and Address1
Insured name and address

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code
- name1 (`String`): Name line 1
- name2 (`String`): Name line 2


## Name, Address and Phone1
Acquirer's information contact name, street address, city or town, state or province, country, ZIP or foreign postal code, and telephone no. (If different from ACQUIRER)

### Properties
- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'
- postalCode (`String`): Postal code
- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code
- name1 (`String`): Name line 1
- name2 (`String`): Name line 2
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 1`): Phone number

- line1 (`String`): Address line 1
- line2 (`String`): Address line 2
- line3 (`String`): Address line 3
- city (`String`): City
- region (`String`): State, Province, Territory, Canton or Prefecture. From [Universal Postal Union](https://www.upu.int/en/Postal-Solutions/Programmes-Services/Addressing-Solutions#addressing-s42-standard) as of 2-26-2020, [S42 International Address Standards](https://www.upu.int/UPU/media/upu/documents/PostCode/S42_International-Addressing-Standards.pdf). For U.S. addresses can be 2-character code from '#/components/schemas/StateCode'

- country (`ISO 3166 Country Code 2`): Country code
- name1 (`String`): Name line 1
- name2 (`String`): Name line 2
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 1`): Phone number

## Tax Party1
Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party2
Box C, Fiduciary's name and address

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party3
Boxes 10-15, Employer EIN, name and address

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party4
Box 6, If other than TRANSFEROR, name, address and tin of corporation whose stock is being transferred

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party6
Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party7
Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Party8
Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmitted on enclosing TaxStatement, if it is the same on all its included tax forms.

### Properties
- tin (`String`): Issuer or recipient Tax Identification Number. Usually EIN for issuer and SSN for recipient
- partyType (`Tax Party Type 2`): Type of issuer or recipient legal entity, as "BUSINESS" or "INDIVIDUAL". Commonly BUSINESS for issuer and INDIVIDUAL for recipient
- individualName (`Individual Name 4`): Individual issuer or recipient name
- businessName (`Business Name 1`): Business issuer or recipient name
- address (`Address 1`): Issuer or recipient address
- phone (`Telephone Number Plus Extension 4`): Issuer or recipient telephone number
- email (`String`): Issuer or recipient email address. (Additional information, not part of IRS forms)


## Tax Refund Direct Deposit2
Tax refund direct deposit information

### Properties
- institutionName (`String`): Name of institution
- rtn (`String`): Routing transit number
- accountNumber (`String`): Account number
- accountNickName (`String`): Account nickname


## Tax Statement1
The TaxStatement json for a single tax document containing one or more tax reporting forms for the customer

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- taxStatementId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for the tax statement. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the id on the enclosed tax form(s), or this may be a different id
- issuer (`Tax Party 6`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms
- recipient (`Tax Party 7`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms
- taxDataType (`Type Data Type 1`): Whether this `application/json` tax form response contains data in `forms` property (as 'JSON' format) or `pdf` property (as 'BASE64_PDF' format)
- forms (`array<Tax Data>`): The list of data contents for all included tax forms, response should include one of `forms` or `pdf`
- pdf (`Binary`): PDF version of the tax statement containing all form pages, binary encoded as Base64, response should include one of `pdf` or `forms`
- attributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Additional tax statement attributes that the provider wishes to include


## Tax Statement2
The TaxStatement json for a single tax document containing one or more tax reporting forms for the customer, one or more of which contain an Error

### Properties
- taxYear (`Number`): Year for which taxes are being paid
- taxStatementId (`String`): Long-term persistent id for the tax statement. Depending upon the data provider, this may be the same id as the id on the enclosed tax form(s), or this may be a different id
- issuer (`Tax Party 6`): Issuer's name, address, phone, and TIN. Issuer data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms
- recipient (`Tax Party 7`): Recipient's name, address, phone, and TIN. Recipient data need only be transmittted on TaxStatement, 'JSON' data type responses if it is the same on all included tax forms
- taxDataType (`Type Data Type 1`): Whether this `application/json` tax form response contains data in `forms` property (as 'JSON' format) or `pdf` property (as 'BASE64_PDF' format)
- forms (`array<Tax Data>`): The list of data contents for all included tax forms, response should include one of `forms` or `pdf`
- pdf (`Binary`): PDF version of the tax statement containing all form pages, binary encoded as Base64, response should include one of `pdf` or `forms`
- attributes (`array<Fi Attribute Entity>`): Additional tax statement attributes that the provider wishes to include


## TaxLot


### Properties
- costBasis (`Decimal`): Total amount of money spent acquiring this lot including any fees or commission expenses incurred.
- currentValue (`Decimal`): Lot market value
- originalPurchaseDate (`DateTime`): Lot acquired date.
- postionType (`Postion Type`): LONG, SHORT.
- purchasedPrice (`Decimal`): Original purchase price.
- quantity (`Decimal`): Lot quantity.


## telephone


### Properties
- number (`String`)
- type (`Phone Type`)
- country (`String`): Country calling codes defined by ITU-T recommendations E.123 and E.164


## Telephone Number Plus Extension1
Phone number

### Properties
- type (`Telephone Number Type 2`): Type of phone number: HOME, BUSINESS, CELL, FAX
- country (`String`): Country calling codes defined by ITU-T recommendations E.123 and E.164
- number (`String`): Telephone subscriber number defined by ITU-T recommendation E.164
- extension (`String`): An arbitrary length telephone number extension


## Telephone Number Plus Extension2
PSE's phone number

### Properties
- type (`Telephone Number Type 2`): Type of phone number: HOME, BUSINESS, CELL, FAX
- country (`String`): Country calling codes defined by ITU-T recommendations E.123 and E.164
- number (`String`): Telephone subscriber number defined by ITU-T recommendation E.164
- extension (`String`): An arbitrary length telephone number extension


## Telephone Number Plus Extension4
Issuer or recipient telephone number

### Properties
- type (`Telephone Number Type 2`): Type of phone number: HOME, BUSINESS, CELL, FAX
- country (`String`): Country calling codes defined by ITU-T recommendations E.123 and E.164
- number (`String`): Telephone subscriber number defined by ITU-T recommendation E.164
- extension (`String`): An arbitrary length telephone number extension


## Telephone Number Type2
Type of phone number: HOME, BUSINESS, CELL, FAX

### Properties
- BUSINESS
- CELL
- FAX
- HOME

## TransactionReason
Reason for this transaction; CALL (the debt was called), SELL (the debt was sold), MATURITY (the debt reached maturity)

### Properties
- CALL
- SELL
- MATURITY

## vesting


### Properties

- vestedValue (`Decimal`): Vested balance at grant (aggregate of all vestings)

- vestExpireDate (`DateTime`)
- vestedStatus (`String`)
